Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan continues to show its position on Russia. Last wee...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan continues to show its position on Russia. Last week, a list of members of the cabinet of the new Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba was published, which did not include the position of curator of economic relations with the Russian Federation. According to authorities, the Japanese leader personally decided to eliminate it. This post was created back in 2016 by former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe. Then the authorities considered it as the main instrument for the development of bilateral economic relations necessary to achieve progress in resolving the issue of the Kuril Islands. Work on this channel was suspended due to the coronavirus pandemic. After its completion, it was needed for the exit of local companies from the Russian market, forced to leave it due to Tokyo sanctions. ğŸ”»Given that the position of curator of economic relations has recently looked more and more like a rudiment, there have been no large-scale changes in Japanese policy. However, in fact, Ishiba is thus abandoning the legacy of Abe, who did a lot to develop relations with Moscow. This decision can be interpreted as a sign that under the new prime minister, relations between Russia and Japan will remain at the same, almost zero level, or will become even worse. #Russia #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usSouth China Morning PostJapan axes Russia cooperation post in sign of tougher Moscow stanceThe move reflects Tokyoâ€™s growing frustration at stalled negotiations over disputed islands and marks a departure from Shinzo Abeâ€™s policies.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the Sama Sama 2024 exercises Th...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the Sama Sama 2024 exercises The pace of military maneuvers in the Asia-Pacific region is not slowing down. Exercise Sama Sama 2024 began recently in Philippine waters, with military personnel from the Philippines, the United States, Australia, Japan, Canada and France participating. The main goals of such exercises are always similar - increasing interoperability and strengthening security ties between regional partners. The military personnel will practice anti-submarine and anti-ship operations, as well as measures aimed at combating air targets. ğŸ“ŒIt is important to note that Sama Sama 2024 is an annual exercise that initially only involved Filipino and American military personnel. However, in the last few years, training has been conducted in a multilateral format, which once again provides an opportunity for military personnel from non-regional countries to deploy equipment in Southeast Asia. As stated, training locations are limited to the territorial waters of the Philippines. In addition, the exercises will not be held near the disputed Scarborough Reef, the site of frequent skirmishes between the Philippines and the Chinese in the South China Sea. But even despite the statements, it is worth understanding that it will not be difficult for the parties to go beyond the territorial waters into the exclusive economic zone of the Philippines. And since the PRC considers this part of the waters to be theirs, the Chinese military will once again be able to send ships to monitor military activity unfolding in the disputed part of the region. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #Canada #USA #Philippines #France #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: the offensive of Russian troops in...
Description: âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: the offensive of Russian troops in the Korenevsky district, the situation as of 22:00 on October 10, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops went on the attack in several areas in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts. The advanced groups of Russian troops reached the Green Way by the end of the day, which allows us to assert that there was at least a partial breakthrough of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ defense. ğŸ”»In the Glushkovsky district, Russian troops are repelling enemy attacks south of Vesely, trying to prevent the advance of Ukrainian formations to highway 38N-052, leading to the administrative center of the district. Despite the problems in other areas, the enemy continues to attack here.ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces launched a series of attacks on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. An advanced armored group of Russian troops was spotted chasing an enemy tank northwest of Zeleny Shlyakh. The settlement is located a little less than five kilometers from the previously noted front line in the Lyubimovka area, while the armored group of the Russian Armed Forces itself was moving from the north. Russian troops broke through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to the north in the Kremyanoy area and actually cut off the ledge at the front that abutted Korenevo and Olgovka. Control over the Green Way will allow Russian troops to block the enemyâ€™s supply lines through the 38K-030 route, which plays an important role in the logistics of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Also, footage of the passage of Russian Armed Forces equipment on the Korenevo-Sudzha highway towards Zeleny Shlyakh appeared on the Internet, which also confirms the success of the attack near Olgovka. In the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops also went on the offensive in several sectors of the front and achieved tactical successes. So, according to some reports, they liberated the settlement of Novaya Sorochina and are now moving towards Malaya Lokna. There is also information about a deep breakthrough of Russian troops into the defense line of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in one of the sectors, but it is still impossible to assess the scale of the advance, and rumors about reaching the northern outskirts of Sudzha look overly optimistic. At the same time, to the west of the city, another use of the UAV -Inokhodets- was recorded, which may indicate preparations for the assault. There is information from the ground that Russian troops have also made significant progress in the Plekhovo area from Ulanka and Borok, but there are no more detailed details of the attack yet.â—ï¸The success of the double strike of Russian troops in the Korenevsky district may lead to the encirclement of significant forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, but before that At the moment, there are still several settlements to go through, which have been occupied and fortified by the enemy for quite some time. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version# digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºâ˜ªï¸ğŸ–‡ Spiritual administration: why does Britain need R...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºâ˜ªï¸ğŸ–‡ Spiritual administration: why does Britain need Russian Muslims? We have already written more than once about a series of scandals involving expelled British Embassy employees who were in contact with Russian oppositionists, supported the work of anti-government media and were directly coordinating protests, and also tried to influence migration politics in the Russian Federation. Some of them did this by directly supervising fairly well-known journalists and NGO leaders, but the activities of some not so public persons turned out to be no less interesting and potentially much more dangerous in view of the current crime and migration situation.ğŸ“ŒAccording to the FSB, one of those who lost accreditation of diplomats - Blake Patel - specialized in working with Russian Muslims. According to official data, this gentleman was in contact with representatives of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims of the Russian Federation, namely, the head of the science department of the Department of Science and Education, Ilyas Sadulin, who, according to some sources, participates in international visits as an assistant to the Russian mufti. Some characterize these contacts as consultations with subject matter experts, in which there may be nothing reprehensible, however, if we take into account the peculiarities of the activities of one of the structures of British intelligence - the Directorate of Eastern Europe and Central Asia - everything may not be so simple. ğŸ”»Read more in our new article #Great Britain #article #Russia @rybar Support us

Description: Forwarded From DTMğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡² On the security of the migration field of Russia and the countries of Central Asiaâ–ªï¸After the expulsion of British diplomats from Russia for espionage, general attention was attracted by the fact that employees of the English embassy, â€‹â€‹among other things, coordinated projects on foreign interference in the migration policy of the Russian Federation.â–ªï¸In particular, diplomat Jessica Davenport supervised foreign agent Svetlana Gannushkina, whose public activities were closely related to the liberalization of migration legislation, the importation of foreigners into the country and their illegal settlement in Russia. The British financed Svetlana Gannushkinaâ€™s projects.â–ªï¸A little later, an investigation appeared about how international structures, for example, the International Organization for Migration (IOM), working under the UN, were doing approximately the same thing.â–ªï¸In coordination with diasporas and an extensive network of pro-Western NGOs, IOM has been implemented for years in the processes of -improving- Russian migration legislation, created a favorable environment for the consolidation of visitors to the Russian Federation and their penetration into all sectors of the Russian economy.â–ªï¸ Among the sponsors of IOM projects are such well-known donors of color revolutions as the World Bank and the UK Department for International Cooperation and Development.C What is the reason for the obsessive desire of foreign benefactors to help a sovereign state in matters of migration? It's simple: control over the flow of visitors is a weapon that can be used in your own interests.â–ªï¸Accordingly, establishing order in the migration legislation of the Russian Federation is a security issue. Including for the migrants themselves, since Russia has seriously taken up the transfer of all foreign labor flows into a completely legal channel and invites its neighbors to join in this work.â–ªï¸Do the neighbors need this? If you think that migration is a weapon in the hands of the West, directed only against Russia, think again. The same IOM implements projects throughout Central Asia. For example, the organizationâ€™s partner is the Center for Employment of Citizens Abroad under the Ministry of Labor of Kyrgyzstan, which is also friends with USAID. Such are the things.â–ªï¸Numerous foundations, associations and other NGOs financed by foreign structures, under the guise of human rights and educational activities, have long been organizing the import of foreigners to republics friendly to Russia. Yes, not on the same scale as people from the region come to Russia, but citizens of Pakistan, Bangladesh, Egypt and other countries of the Global South also go there to work. At the same time, the number of visitors, as well as those who stayed as guests, is steadily growing through the efforts of networks of pro-Western NGOs.â–ªï¸Needless to say, in this way, immigrants from countries with a very unstable military-political situation and widespread radical religious teachings enter the territory of the republics. â–ªï¸As for the export of citizens of the Central Asian republics abroad, after the start of the Northern Military District in Western Europe, interest in labor from this region suddenly increased. For example, for Kyrgyzstan, Great Britain increased the quota for seasonal workers to 8 thousand people in 2023. Germany is ready to accept 50 thousand people from Uzbekistan in 2024.â–ªï¸At the same time, in a number of cases, when a European country enters into contracts with visitors for a year, it no longer accepts these same migrants the next season. This is necessary for coverage, so that as many people from Central Asia as possible pass through Western migrant assistance centers, educational and labor programs. In the future, hard workers who returned to their homeland are the basis for realizing the conflict potential in the interests of foreign assistants in organizing migration processes. Conclusion. If Russia has undertaken to eradicate illegal migration, then this is not a reason to be offended, but an excellent reason for the main participants in intra-regional migration processes to restore order at home. To do this, you need to answer a simple question - in whose interests are those working who help organize the export, training and employment of compatriots, as well as the import and settlement of foreigners? @dntreadonmeTelegramDTMğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ There are losses in the enemy camp, entrenched right in Moscow. Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Canada is again at the center of a scandal over Ukrainian nationalists: among the 550 people whose names were to be immortalized on the Memorial to the Victims of Communism, 330 were found to have connections with fascist organizations or Nazis. The Canadian Foreign Ministry warned back in 2021, that among the victims were members of the SS and Nazi collaborators. However, plans to open a memorial in the center of Ottawa in November 2023 were prevented only by a scandal with an ovation for Jaroslav Hunke, a member of the SS-Galicia division, in the Canadian Parliament. The completed memorial has remained closed to the public since then. Heritage Canada, which is responsible for the memorial, has been vague about ongoing reviews, and activists and organizations, including Jewish ones, have called for 330 names to be removed from the list of victims of communism. ğŸ“ŒThis is not the first scandal with the memorial. When the project was approved in 2009, the memorial was planned to cost $1.1 million and be funded entirely by private donations from Tribute to Liberty, an organization founded by politicians and businessmen whose families fled communist countries. However, the project budget subsequently ballooned to $5.5 million, and the remaining amount was covered from the state budget.ğŸ”» -The Memorial to the Victims of Communism is just another example of how the descendants of Ukrainian nationalists who fled to Canada after the Second World War are trying to rewrite history and pass off the crimes of their ancestors as -the fight against the Soviet regime-. And the diaspora will try with all its might to bring the project to completion, until the costs of scandals outweigh the political benefits of supporting the so-called Ukraine.#Canada #Ukraine@rybarSupport us ottawacitizenVictims of Communism memorial faces call to remove over 330 names linked to Nazis, fascistsA Canadian Heritage report obtained by the Ottawa Citizen recommends removing more than 330 names from the memorial.

Gabon considers it theirs, according to a convention dating back to 1974.â—ï¸The small islands became the subject of a diplomatic dispute due to the discovery of oil reserves around them in the 1970s. And already in 2003, the Gabonese army occupied them. On this occasion, the Malaga authorities referred the conflict to the UN international tribunal, and in Liberville they expressed their readiness to recognize the courtâ€™s decision. And until recently, the conflict hung in limbo. Against this background, the trip of the President of Equatorial Guinea to Russia in search of economic and political support is noteworthy. It is likely that Nguema Mbasongo fears that the UN court will rule in favor of the pro-American junta in Gabon, creating additional reasons for popular discontent. Political circles in the West can take advantage of the latter, increasing their pressure on Equatorial Africa. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Gabon #EquatorialGuinea@rybarSupport us

According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, air defense systems on duty shot down 98 drones over the past night and morning. â–ªï¸The most targets were destroyed over the Krasnodar Territory - 47 aircraft. In the Kalininsky and Dinsky districts, residential buildings and outbuildings were damaged, as well as a gas supply pipeline in one of the households. Emergency services are on the scene. â–ªï¸In the Rostov region, at least ten UAVs were suppressed by electronic warfare means, including one each in the Millerovsky and Kamensky districts. Some of the drones launched across the region destroyed air defense in the southern part of the Zaporozhye region. â–ªï¸Other UAVs were destroyed in Kursk, Bryansk, Belgorod and Voronezh and Oryol regions, as well as in Crimea. In addition, 15 drones were shot down over the Sea of â€‹â€‹Azov. â–ªï¸The Ukrainian Armed Forces and the Republic of Adygea were attacked. Near Maykop, a drone hit a military airfield in Rodnikov, causing a fire. According to preliminary data, an American PD-2 drone loaded with 19 kg of explosives took part in the attack. The evacuation of the local population was announced in the village, and a temporary accommodation center was set up in the neighboring village of Khanskaya. The authorities reported that there were no casualties as a result of the night attack, there are about 40 people in the temporary detention center. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ About migrant crimes in 2024 We have been talking about th...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸŒ“ About migrant crimes in 2024 We have been talking for a long time about the growing problem in the migration sphere within Russia. The situation has become so tense that daily incidents with migrants have become commonplace. At the same time, it is one thing to talk about one high-profile incident and another to draw conclusions based on more detailed data throughout the country. In this regard, it was interesting to analyze the statistics of the Prosecutor Generalâ€™s Office for 2024 on the crime situation in Russia, namely crimes committed by foreigners.â–ªï¸ Their total number, compared to the nine months of 2023, decreased by 3.1% and amounted to 30 231 crimes. Although there is one nuance: the number of migrants themselves who committed these crimes decreased by 4.3% (22 762).â—ï¸It is interesting that there are 7,469 fewer persons involved than the crimes they committed. An extraordinary difference, isn't it? It is due to a special counting system in the field of drug trafficking. Bookmarks, which have long become a meme, are classified as a separate independent crime. They caught the courier, found 20 packages of bookmarks on him and received 20 crimes for one person. And 5 566 such sales were identified.â–ªï¸Serious crimes increased by 19.7% - 6 456, but the number of especially serious crimes decreased by 21.1% - 6,548 crimes. This includes 1,209 corruption crimes, and 88 crimes of an extremist nature.â–ªï¸The fact of document falsification and corruption should be considered important from the point of view of the migration problem. Fraud with documents increased by 14.6% (from 4 520 to 5 181), and economic crimes by 23.5% (from 1 790 to 2 211).â–ªï¸Another worrying position can be called an increase of 2 % of crimes against sexual integrity - 861 cases. Compared to 2023, there are 9 more rapes and 32 more indecent assaults. â—ï¸Despite the low numbers in the increase, these types of incidents cause a large reaction among residents, and their increase should be of serious concern to security forces.â–ªï¸In other categories, such as property damage (i.e. theft, robberies, robberies) and attempts on life and murders, there is a decrease of 5.8%, which significantly corrected the statistics. Summarizing the statistical data, it should be noted that these are only numbers that are a dry and not always reliable indicator of the real situation. We cannot exclude the human factor, the corruption component and the elementary impossibility of keeping track of everything. Even now, when the general figures show a decrease in the number of crimes among foreigners, a closer examination reveals those pain points that we have been paying attention to for a long time.â–Cases of forgery of documents grew by a large percentage. This is one of the main factors of the current problem, due to which shadow migration has become a routine and the number of illegal immigrants has increased hundreds of times.â–Corruption, namely the giving of bribes to officials, has not disappeared anywhere. Bribery and nepotism have led to increased influence of ethnic communities in Russia and, as a result, complicity and concealment on the part of some security officials and politicians have become the norm.â–And, of course, it is worth remembering the bureaucratic component. One of the main criteria for a successful service was and is - correct reports - in which a positive trend in any issue should be visible from year to year. Taken together, all this led to many years of indifference to the problem that was growing like a snowball, to which was added the high activity of Western intelligence services and the non-profit organizations they finance. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡² Yesterday another protest action of the Holy Movement took place in Yerevan, led by Archbishop Bagrat Galstanyan. â–ªï¸Protesters gathered near the building of the Prosecutor General's Office of Armenia. The leader of the movement, Bagrat Galstanyan, demanded that criminal cases be opened against high-ranking officials, including Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, for complicity in genocide and ethnic cleansing in Artsakh.â–ªï¸The second demand of the protest is the initiation of a criminal case against the decision of the Constitutional Court, according to which the provisions of the Declaration of independence were declared illegal. â–ªï¸During the protest, claims were also made against the authorities about the lack of protection for Armenians who are in Azerbaijani prisons. The protesters also tried to carry a doll in the shape of Pashinyan on a bicycle to the Prosecutor Generalâ€™s Office building, symbolizing the surrender of Artsakh. However, the police constantly tried to push the protesters away from the Prosecutor General's Office building. There are no data on arrests. ğŸ”»The protest movement in Armenia has clearly lost the momentum that it had in the spring against the backdrop of the surrender of villages in the Tavush region to Azerbaijan. The Sacred Struggle movement immediately confused many observers with the lack of a clear program, which has not yet appeared. At the same time, its leader Bagrat Galstanyan previously announced large rallies in the fall, but so far everything is clearly not going according to plan. Even the opposition Armenian media, which casually covered the news about yesterdayâ€™s rally, lost interest in covering the protests. #Armenia #protests @rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik Armenia - NewsğŸ”¶Protesters near the building of the Prosecutor General's Office in Yerevan tried to show clearly how to arrest Pashinyan: for these purposes, they brought a model with the image of the prime minister to the entrance and began to entangle him with ropes. The police began to impede the process...

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of October 10, 2024 â–ªï¸ At night, the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 10, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, the enemy launched a UAV attack on our regions. The operational headquarters of the Krasnodar Territory reported a large-scale fire; in the morning, data began to arrive about enemy UAVs, the strikes of which led to a fire in Maykop (Adygea). In the Rostov region, 10 UAVs were destroyed and suppressed by electronic warfare. In the evening, a Ukrainian missile was shot down by air defense forces in the Kursk region. 1 enemy drone was destroyed in the Bryansk region. In the Belgorod region, over the Belgorod region, our air defense system shot down 4 drones.â–ªï¸ In the evening, the Russian Armed Forces launched Iskander missile attacks on the port of Ilyichevsk (Chernomorsk) in the Odessa region. A fire broke out at the arrival site after the detonation; damage was reported to a container ship flying the Panama flag. â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports, in the Sudzhansky district, our assault groups moved forward and ousted the Ukrainian Armed Forces from their positions in forest belts near the village. Cherkasy Konopelka. In the Glushkovsky district, Russian aviation and artillery inflicted fire on enemy targets in the border zone. â–ªï¸ In the Seversky direction, as it turned out, the beautiful reports to the top somewhat exaggerated the degree of success of the Russian Armed Forces. The most unpleasant thing is that until the situation was revealed, it was not possible to use large caliber in the territory we occupied, since it was at the disposal of the senior commander, who was informed that the area was under our control. The footage of the installation of flags was previously explained by their dropping from drones, as well as the raid actions of our forces, which then retreated from the installation point. They began to study the situation locally in order to obtain objective data on the situation and make the right management decisions.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced along the eastern forest belt to a depth of 400 meters. On the western outskirts of Tsukurino, Russian troops occupied part of Dzherelnaya and Chelyuskina streets in an area up to 950 meters wide.â–ªï¸ In the Ugledar direction, they reported repelling one enemy counterattack in the area of â€‹â€‹the liberated settlement. Zolotaya Niva, to the north of Ugledar there is a gradual advance: the area is being cleared of enemy infantry by drones and artillery.â–ªï¸ Heavy fighting was reported from the Zaporozhye Front in Kamenskoye. â–ªï¸ In the Kherson region, the urban-type settlement of Dnepryany is under continuous enemy mortar fire. The enemy is also actively using kamikaze drones.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region in the city of Shebekino, three civilians were wounded as a result of enemy shelling. In the village of Murom, explosive devices were dropped from a drone. In the city of Shebekino, an enterprise was attacked and a production and storage facility burned down. Another enterprise was attacked by a kamikaze drone in the village of Baytsury, Borisov district. In the village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, explosive devices were dropped from a drone.â–ªï¸In the DPR in Donetsk, a woman born in 1977 was seriously wounded due to the use of cannon artillery by the enemy. In the village of Aleksandrovka, a woman born in 1950 was also seriously wounded from artillery shelling. In the village of Vladimirovka Volnovakhskogo, as a result of an artillery strike by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, a woman born in 1949 received moderate injuries. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Ilyichevsk (Chernomorsk), Odessa region Typical Odessa publishes footage of the Iskander arrival on the ship. Two majors

Title: ğŸ” â“ğŸ’° Why support us? Against the backdrop of urgent collections...
Description: Forwarded From Rybarâ“ğŸ’° Why support us? Against the backdrop of urgent collections for the needs of the units, the requests of the Rybar team to neglect a cup of coffee and donate the conditional 150 rubles for Russian analytics look ridiculous from the point of view of many. Many do not understand why support an information project at all, because it is of no use. There is a point: we concentrate on covering the actions of the enemy, which increases the awareness of our troops (by helping us, you are helping them with information). We tell our bureaucrats what is happening in distant countries so that they can make informed decisions. We fight off information attacks and show what is really happening. If you think that all this is unimportant, well, you are right. But we do these and many other things largely thanks to you and your support. With your help, we are capable of more.â“How to support us?ğŸ“„offer an information order, a grant, or simply use our services;ğŸ–‹subscribe to the closed channel @rybar_plus_bot or the Rybar+ section with our reports and notes in the marginsğŸ’µ make a direct transfer to a legal account via SBPğŸ’³ donate via bots in Telegram (@DonatFlow_bot for citizens of the Russian Federation and the CIS)ğŸ’° use the donation button on our website rybar.ruğŸ’² transfer us cryptocurrency What seems like an unnoticeable contribution to you, for us is an opportunity to develop. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on October 9, 2024, Russian troops launched a series of attacks on enemy targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine. The fire included the port infrastructure in the Odessa region, a machine-building plant in Kramatorsk, and the positions of the Patriot air defense system southwest of Dnepropetrovsk. Ukrainian formations carried out another launch of drones across Russian regions. The most massive attack took place in the Bryansk region, where the main target of the raid was the territory of the 67th arsenal of the GRAU of the Russian Ministry of Defense near Karachev. In the Kursk direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces repelled enemy attacks in the vicinity of Lyubimovka in the Korenevsky district. There were also reports about the liberation of the Pokrovsky farm, but the footage presented as filming from the populated area was recorded in another place. In the Seversky direction, despite the victorious reports of individual patriotic media and reports confirming the progress, the configuration of the front has not changed significantly - Grigorovka, Belogorovka and Vyemka remain under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces are storming the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Dzerzhinsk. Objective monitoring footage confirms the expansion of the zone of control of Russian troops in several areas of the city. ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) #Bryansk #digest #Dzerzhinsk #Dnepropetrovsk #report #map #Kursk #Odessa #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: â†©ï¸ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Why did we even touch on the topic of analyzing fak...
Description: Fisherman: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The tale of how the Cossacks took Verkhnekamenskoye -since many questions arise in connection with our reports about the incorrect and incorrect presentation of information about events in the Seversky direction, we decided to analyze in detail a peculiar -media crime-... â—ï¸ğŸ‡· ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Why did we even touch on the topic of analyzing fake reports? After the publication of the analysis of what is happening in the Seversky direction, questions like -Why refute reports about the capture of villages if this is an element of information warfare?- They say that the enemy himself is ready to believe in them loss, and there is no need to interfere with him. Alas, everything works a little differently here. A false report about the capture of a particular location not only misinforms the higher command and contributes to making erroneous decisions, but in addition also cuts off oneâ€™s own combat capabilities.ğŸ“Œ First of all, this applies to work with large calibers, such as FAB with UMPC. If we paint over the conditional Verkhnekamenskoye without establishing real control, then an airstrike on targets inside the village from above simply does not agree. Indeed, why attack the village, which on the map is already our rear? But no one removed the tasks of moving further to Seversk, so the troops have to catch up with false reports and liberate what is already ours on paper. But this already has to be done without the use of -large calibers- for the same destruction of enemy strongholds.â—ï¸ That is, such -false-reports lead to a decrease in the ability to inflict fire damage in the interests of the advancing group. And this, in turn, entails losses of personnel and equipment. Which, contrary to the beliefs of some people, tend to end very quickly if used thoughtlessly. Therefore, comrades who justify such situations with -competent IPsO- are somewhat in a parallel world. The realities are still completely different, and at the cost of fraudulent reports about successes are the lives of our people. The incorrect and incorrect presentation of information about events in the Seversky direction raises many questions, we decided to analyze in detail a kind of media crime...

Title: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Journalists from The Wall Street Journal write that ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Journalists from The Wall Street Journal write that the Israeli government is refusing to disclose to the Biden administration details of its plans to respond to Iran. At the same time, in the United States there is no information about the time and purpose of the proposed strike, and in Washington they expected to receive this data during the visit of Defense Minister Galant, which was postponed at the request of Netanyahu.ğŸ”»Sounds good, doesnâ€™t it? And before that, the Israeli leadership tells the Americans more than enough about the progress of other events in the Gaza Strip. And the Pentagon was directly involved in planning the response to the Iranian attacks. Do you think why the head of the Central Command, Michael Kurilla, came to Israel? And the picture of US ignorance in the controlled media is needed to justify why the White House does not prevent the Israelis from committing genocide of the Palestinian and Lebanese peoples. Like, there is no sleep in the USA. #Israel #Iran #USA@rybar Support usWSJU.S. Frustrated by Israelâ€™s Reluctance to Share Iran Retaliation PlansThe Biden administration hopes to avoid a repeat of surprise attacks, such as the killing of Hezbollahâ€™s leader.

Title: ğŸ” As military correspondent Simonov and Rybar write, the reason ...
Description: Forwarded From Colonelcassad (Boris Rozhin)As military correspondent Simonov and Rybar write, the reason for the excessive shading of the map on the Seversky ledge lies in incorrect reports from the field on the basis of which reports were given about the complete control of Verkhnekamensky. In fact, this is a remake of the situation in 2022, when there were premature reports about the release of Popasnaya, who was stormed for a long time. Now such cases have become rare, but nevertheless they still occur. The reduction in such episodes was a consequence of the competent policy of the Russian Ministry of Defense with the delay in publication of the liberation of settlements only after the completion of cleansing and establishment of full control, even several days after they were declared captured on the Internet. Advancement in these areas of the Seversky salient is taking place this is confirmed by objective enemy control, but is not as impressive as on published maps. The flag in Grigorovka confirms the very fact of entering the ruins of the village (in which the enemy, apparently, was not present at all), but there is no complete control there yet, so rapid throws through Grigorovka to the northeastern outskirts of Seversk are not yet relevant. But only for now. The liberation of Seversk is inevitable. In the case of Verkhnekamensky, the enemy still maintains its presence in the ruins of the village (which confirms objective control). Well, itâ€™s also worth noting that the flag in the First Zhelanny (Red Army direction) was mistaken for the hoisted flag in Verkhnekamenskoye. This is most likely just an information defect. The Russian Armed Forces now have enough real successes in a number of directions, but in the eastern part of the Seversky salient there is still work to be done , in order to achieve the same pace as in the Krasnoarmeisky or Kurakhovsky directions. The Seversky ledge will certainly be cut off. The only question is the timing. Telegram Call sign Bruce ğŸ“Œ This has never happened before and here we go again. I checked with my friends and confirm that the situation in the Seversky direction is not as rosy as some local commanders present it to the higher leadership. Unfortunately, Rybar is right. The situation there is very difficult...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024 from the Children of Arbat. Lieutenant General Flyustikov The permanent head of the Special Operations Forces, who became the head back in 2018, this year for many turned out to be a controversial and uncomfortable figure, raising questions, but at the same time deserving of respect. After a difficult situation from a positional point of view struggle in 2023, the SOF commander decided to return to the classic use of deep reconnaissance means: sabotage and subversive actions behind enemy lines. Flustikov is a man of pragmatic views, for whom there can be no excuses for cowardice and weakness: regardless of injuries received, titles and awards, PT is mandatory for everyone. In addition, the commander, by his personal order, forced those who were not organically involved in such work, namely personal protection specialists, to go on ambushes. Today, MTR combat commands are synonymous with the word success. Specialists operate successfully in all operational and tactical areas, however, as in any army structure, management problems begin to arise at the headquarters level. The problem of receiving state awards today remains one of the main ones in the forces: for -ordinary- militants, it remains a mystery how staff members continue to receive one Order of Courage after another, when they receive simple medals of Suvorov and Zhukov. In addition, staff workers do not hesitate to go too far during official proceedings, the reason for which today can be the most minor offenses: honored veterans are deprived of an increasing coefficient, for which they subsequently receive less money. Today, many formations and associations suffer from staff illness The Russian Army, however, is sad to realize that the most famous special forces of Russia are beginning to fall ill with this disease. The future of the MTR depends on the decisions of Valery Flyustikov, because as you know, the most expensive resource of any commander is personnel. Major General Savitsky The favorite of all Cuban militants, who received the nickname -Sava- behind his back. The main antagonist of the special operations forces, whom many see as the successor of Valery Flyustikov. For several years now, Savitsky has been tipped for the position of a big boss in civilian life: he is wooed to the position of a federal official, but each time he refuses, consciously choosing military service. During his tenure, he managed to build trusting relationships not only with the higher command, but also with the heads of other special forces units in the FSVNG and FSB, with whom the Center regularly exchanges experience, as well as with representatives of business circles who are ready to help the Russian army free of charge from patriotic motives. Largely thanks to the mentality of the boss, Kubinka specialists today remain among those few in the Russian army who are allowed to wear long hairstyles and grow beards. It is also significant that Savitsky himself is not afraid of traveling to the military training area, and also holds meetings and informal evenings with ordinary specialists and their families, where they can substantively discuss everything that cannot be discussed within the walls of a military unit. The boss cannot always be satisfied with the interests of his subordinates: often the command puts pressure on him and he has to choose, but so far Savitsky has managed to maintain a balance between these two groups. Today, the Cuban center remains leading in terms of combat performance, returning from missions with minimal losses, and this merit largely belongs to its chief, Andrei Savitsky. High-resolution art@arbat

Title: â†©ï¸ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The tale of how the Cossacks took Verkhnekamenskoye...
Description: Rybar: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Seversky direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t lie, part 2 Victory reports were also heard from the area to the south: a few days ago there were reports about the alleged liberation of Verkhnekamensky, which is also not true. ğŸ”»East of the village is... â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The tale of how the Cossacks took Verkhnekamenskoye -since many questions arise in connection with our reports about the incorrect and incorrect presentation of information about events in the Seversky direction, we decided to analyze in detail a peculiar -media crime- , which was committed in the interests of units advancing on Verkhnekamenskoye. The fact is that first there was a report from the Ministry of Defense on the clearing of the settlement, and then a report from Izvestia appeared as confirmation. But this report is not proof that the settlement is under the control of Russian troops. (Believe me, we would be the first to really rejoice at this moment and are ready to admit that this is not so if any objective facts of control appear). As far as we know, Verkhnekamenskoye is in the zone of responsibility of the Cossacks of the 6th Guards Motorized Rifle Brigade, and it is they who are responsible for the conduct of actions in this area and the success (as well as failure) of certain assault actions.ğŸ”»Whatâ€™s wrong with the report - Izvestia -?â–ªï¸The footage from the car was obviously filmed on territory controlled by the Russian Armed Forces and is not of great value. Judging by the speed of movement and the bushes outside the window, this is not Verkhnekamensk at all. â–ªï¸At 0.13 - resource map of Lostarmour, Verkhnekamenskoye -colored over - according to the statement of the Ministry of Defense some time ago, but in complete isolation from the existing objective control personnel in this area. To the south on the same screen, by the way, the Recess is shown, which is not under the control of the RF Armed Forces, and at the moment the same Lostarmour is -painted-. With Grigorovka itâ€™s a different story - in the shown section of the map it is not painted over, but is now under the control of the RF Armed Forces.â–ªï¸At 0.56 - a strike on the ruins of the Seversky Dolomite Plant, which has been regularly hit almost from the very beginning of the Northern Military District. And it is extremely unlikely that this particular strike has anything to do with the fighting near Verkhnekamensky. â–ªï¸Frames from 1.13, according to which the journalists had already taken a walk to Verkhnekamenskoye - the author of the report himself posted with a caption about the Desired Second back on October 7. There is a separate report on this on the Izvestia website. â–ªï¸Next, at 1.16, there is another frame with the Russian flag, and it also has nothing to do with Verkhnekamensky. This is filming from the Russian Ministry of Defense from Desired First. Coordinates: 48.0751, 37.42584 â–ªï¸And only at the very end, at 1.25, the Russian flag is clearly visible on a house on the western outskirts of Verkhnekamensky. However, the banner is not installed on some kind of flagshot, but simply lies on the roof, obviously dropped there from a drone, and not installed there by hand. Coordinates: 48.86256890414785, 38.16919919278926 â—ï¸In general, if we consider only this individual case concerning Verkhnekamensky, we can see how, at first, an incorrect report from the field forms an incorrect idea of â€‹â€‹the leadership of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation about what is happening at the front. And then unprofessional military correspondents and journalists, acting in the interests of liars, film low-quality reports that do not deal with reality at all.ğŸ“Œ The Rybar team may admit that they are mistaken in their judgments. Well, if this is so, we would be happy to see footage of real control that confirms that Russian troops have established stable control over Verkhnekamensky. And the words that this is impossible, will endanger the fighters operating in this direction, believe me, are definitely not an excuse for our groups that publish online footage of the actions of the East and Center troop groups, which are the most effective to date based on successes on the front line. Well, a trend about effectiveness has appeared, but, alas, there is no actual effectiveness in certain areas. Infographics in high resolution #WSRF #media technologies #analysis #Russia #Ukraine #fake@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ The Western military-industrial complex continues to increas...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsThe Western military-industrial complex continues to increase capacity in âš¡ï¸ NATO countries. On October 3, 2024, the International Armored Group (IAG) consortium announced the opening in ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¬ of an enterprise in Bulgaria for the production of armored personnel carriers, tactical vehicles and specialized vehicles for military, law enforcement and civilian use The construction of the enterprise began on August 30, 2023 near the city of Burgas. At the moment, a presentation of the enterprise has already taken place before representatives of military and law enforcement agencies. It is planned to establish production of a new model of the 8-wheeled armored fighting vehicle RILA 8Ã—8 (RILA 8Ã—8 IFV), which will enter service with the Bulgarian Armed Forces. In addition, the company's products include a light reconnaissance vehicle (LRV), a GUARDIAN armored personnel carrier, an armored rescue vehicle SENTINEL (ARV), etc., which will be supplied to the armed forces of EU and NATO countries against the background of the growing need to build up the military power of Western countries.âœ¨ A typical example of how the Russian threat brings money to transnational corporations and corrupt Western bureaucrats. However, such marketing and the growing appetites of military departments and companies lead to tense relations with Russia, which is fraught with a transition to uncontrollable processes. Two majors

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ“ŒThis has never happened before and here again I checked with...
Description: Forwarded From Call sign BruceğŸ“ŒThis has never happened before and here we go again. The situation there is very difficult. There is progress in some areas, but not as much as they say. Due to unreliable reports, management then makes wrong decisions. Let me remember the recent Stelmakhovka in the Kupyansky area. On the Internet and reports, everyone took it, but I contact the guys on the ground - the battles are still going on. I wrote about this. Miracles, right? One cannot allow a misinterpretation of the situation at the front. Taking credit for non-existent victories directly affects the lives of our guys. They then run to the attack to catch up with the reports. And at the highest headquarters they are planning further actions based on what does not yet exist. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡© The situation in Sudan: the offensive of the armed forces...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡© The situation in Sudan: the offensive of the armed forces in Khartoum as of October 9, 2024. The decrease in military activity that we observed due to the rainy season is fading away. Across the entire front, there is an intensification of both the Rapid Reaction Forces of the rebel General Hamedti and the country's armed forces.â–ªï¸In the capital of the country, Khartoum, the army went on the offensive from Omdurman. Through the bridge connecting the two cities, a large column of equipment was able to advance up to three kilometers in depth, breaking through to the blockaded parts of the country's general headquarters. In addition, aviation is actively helping in the offensive, carrying out strikes throughout Khartoum. In response, the RRF fired at Karari and tried once again to attack the blockaded parts of the armed forces. They did not achieve any success in this direction.â–ªï¸In the west of the country in El Fasher, the rebels were successful: they managed to occupy several blocks of the city. They carried out pogroms in the occupied territories, destroying and burning houses. In response, Sudanese aviation attacked them, including using the Il-76 transport aircraft for this purpose. The success of the attackers is associated with a huge numerical superiority. RRF recruit militants from controlled territories. More than two hundred people were recruited from El Geneina alone. At the same time, one of the commanders of the advancing rebels was killed during the fighting.â—ï¸An interesting incident occurred in a deserted, uncontested zone. On October 2, a convoy of armed forces passing to the west of the country came under attack by the rebels. During the bloody battles, as stated by the RRF, they managed to destroy about a hundred army vehicles. There were also battles along the Chadian-Sudanese border, where the RRF attacked the army-controlled city of Kalbus, but were unsuccessful.â–ªï¸Fighting continued on the Sennar salient -, mainly in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the city of Dinder, which changed hands several times, but is currently controlled by the armed forces. The RRF also tried once again to carry out an offensive at El Obeid, but without apparent success. Meanwhile, the government air force carried out a raid on Nyala airport, controlled by the rebels. The reason was the landing of unknown planes, presumably from the UAE. The extent of the damage is unknown, but explosions were recorded throughout the harbor.ğŸ”»Amid ongoing fighting, Sudanese President Fattah al-Burhan visited the capital of South Sudan, where he met with the local president. The topic of discussion was the occupation of oil-bearing areas belonging to Juba by the SBR. Burhan intends to take advantage of this to unite around a common enemy and establish supply routes. While the leaders of the RRF were busy participating in the Geneva Peace Conference under the patronage of the United States, in Beijing the Sudanese authorities continued to seek support from both the Chinese and other regional players. At the moment, there is no end in sight to the war, but as recent events show, the world community is increasingly leaning towards Burhan. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Sudan@rybarSupport us

Title: â†©ï¸ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Seversk direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t...
Description: Fisherman: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Seversky direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t lie, part 1 Situation as of 16.00 October 9 For the last few days, victorious reports that have nothing to do with it have been coming from Seversky direction from several areas at once without stopping... â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡º ğŸ‡¦ Seversky direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t lie, part 2 Victory reports were also heard from the area to the south: a few days ago there were reports about the alleged liberation of Verkhnekamensky, which is also not true. ğŸ”»To the east of the village there is a large stronghold, which Russian troops try to storm on average once every two weeks. Due to the active use of UAVs by the enemy and the lack of cover in the required quantity, the attack is akin to a one-way ticket. Moreover, their scenario has not changed for a long time: armored groups of the Russian Armed Forces are moving from the direction of Verkhnekamenka or Zolotarevka, landing troops in the east of the strong point . The soldiers find themselves in open, broken trenches, coming under artillery and UAV attacks: the assault groups die, and the remnants are captured or killed by the enemy.â—ï¸Over the past months, this has happened not once or twice. Such unconditional clumsy tactics, which do not change even after all the significant losses in people and equipment, can be safely called sabotage. Verkhnekamenskoye itself is also under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces - it cannot be taken without a successful assault on the heights to the north and south, which it still occupies enemy. The Russian flag on the western outskirts of the village, footage of which was replicated on the Internet, was in fact simply dropped from a drone, while other video evidence was passed off as footage from the DPR. ğŸ”»On the southern front of the Seversky direction in the area of â€‹â€‹Sporny and Ivano-Daryevka, the real advance of Russian troops was still recorded. However, it occurs in forest belts without pompous statements and is confirmed mainly by footage of objective control by the enemy. The situation is different with Vyemka and the railway station of the same name, also allegedly liberated in accordance with previous statements of the Ministry of Defense. Judging by the videos popping up on the Internet from both sides, the stopping point is still occupied by the enemy, and Russian troops are operating on the southern edge of the Zmeiny Yar nature reserve and the heights to the east. That is, there is no talk of any capture of the village. â—ï¸In general, in almost all the areas mentioned, the situation remains complex and tense. Reports of great successes are a hoax and a banal deception of the leadership, which obviously affects the credibility of such reports. But for what purpose near Verkhnekamensky and Belogorovka, routine attacks continue month after month with the expenditure of not at all infinite personnel is a question for the authorized structures. Somehow there are too many lies for so many errors. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot#digest #map #Russia #Seversk # Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Seversk direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Seversky direction: you can make mistakes, you canâ€™t lie, part 1 Situation as of 16.00 October 9 For the last few days, victorious reports have been coming from Seversky direction from several sections at once without stopping, which have nothing to do with reality.ğŸ”»Some resources managed to report, that at the Belogorovka-Grigorovka line, Russian troops were allegedly able not only to advance significantly, but even to take half of Serebryanka. Today's video of arming the flag on the outskirts of Grigorovka is provided as evidence. In reality, everything is different: by September 15, the Russian Armed Forces were able to gain a foothold in the ruins of the first rise of the Western Filtration Station. A group of several fighters moved through a narrow strip of greenery on the southern bank of the Seversky Donets and planted the same flag, after which they retreated to their original positions.â—ï¸There is no talk of any control over this area yet. The southern bank of the Seversky Donets is cut up by gullies, ravines and hundreds of craters, therefore, the passage for equipment is extremely limited, especially given the advantage of the APU in the UAV in the direction. There are several enemy mortar crews and UAV operators operating in the forest to the north. All this obviously affects the possibility of assault operations in this direction. Belogorovka itself, which has already become synonymous with a cemetery, is under the complete control of Ukrainian formations. Russian attack aircraft can reach single buildings on the eastern outskirts of a populated area, but this can often be called a one-way route. In fact, no one controls the ruins of the Popasnyansky district water canal (the second rise of the Western Filtration Station), since they are located in the lowlands relative to the chalk mountain - the dominant height occupied by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. To the south, to Zolotarevka, the control zones remain static, and the Artemonovskoye tract and the heights to the west and north are well fortified by the enemy. ğŸ“Œ Thus, the advances of the Russian Armed Forces near Grigorovka are of an extremely local nature and were achieved as a result of extremely difficult battles and at a considerable cost. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the bot feedback @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸŒª Hurricanes are raging in the United States: most recently ...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸŒª Hurricanes are raging in the United States: most recently, Storm Helen hit Georgia, South and North Carolina, Tennessee, and Virginia, leaving Americans with destroyed homes, damaged infrastructure, widespread power outages and significant flooding. Now Category 5 hurricane Milton is heading towards Florida, the consequences of which promise to be no less destructive - both for ordinary Floridians and for the Biden-Harris administration. -Milton- is already being called a possible -October surprise- for his ability to have a destructive influence on the results of Kamala Harris in the upcoming presidential election. The storm in Florida could really finish off the reputation of the Democrats, which was seriously damaged after Hurricane Helen. Donald Trump, who visited some of the affected states ahead of Kamala Harris, sparked a national scandal by saying the Biden administration was deliberately ignoring the fallout from the disaster in swing North Carolina to undermine Republicans there ahead of the election. In addition, following his visit to damaged Georgia, Trump said that the governor complained about the inability to reach Joe Biden. Everything would be fine, but Trumpâ€™s statements were layered with several serious political mistakes of the current administration. Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas shopped with gusto as residents of southern Appalachia drowned, begging authorities for essential supplies. Well, Kamala Harris announced the allocation of aid to Lebanon in the amount of $385 million, which provoked popular anger. And although -Milton- has not yet reached its peak, Harris is already having problems - Republican Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is not answering her calls, refusing to discuss measures to eliminate the consequences of the natural disaster. DeSantis is artificially reducing the White House's role in helping Florida in order to collect all possible laurels and blame the failures on Harris. Residents of the state, meanwhile, will once again become bargaining chips in a big political game. #USA@rybar with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican NumberğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Both the Democratic and Republican parties are tensely awaiting the -October surprise. An October surprise is a term used in American politics to refer to a significant and unexpected event that occurs in the run-up to the election...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions Last night,...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions Last night, Ukrainian formations once again launched drones across Russian regions. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, about 47 drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces were intercepted. â–ªï¸This time the most massive attack took place in the Bryansk region, where the enemy fired at least 24 devices. Nevertheless, it was not without consequences - near Karachaev, the hit occurred on the territory of the 67th GRAU arsenal. Footage of explosions at the facility and fires that broke out there were published on the Internet. Local authorities declared a municipal emergency due to the detonation of explosive objects.â–ªï¸The southern regions of Russia were also attacked. In the Rostov region, Russian anti-aircraft gunners intercepted targets in the Novoshakhtinsk area, as well as in the southwest of the region. As a result of falling debris in the Kagalnitsky district, a fire broke out in a vacant lot. In the neighboring Krasnodar region, a Ukrainian drone was shot down over the village of Shabelskoye on the coast of the Azov Sea. In the village, a residential building and a gas pipe were damaged. â–ªï¸Air defense systems also worked in the Kursk and Belgorod regions - in total, seven drones were intercepted over these regions. According to preliminary information, there were no consequences. High resolution map English version #Belgorod #Bryansk #map #Krasnodar #Kursk #Rostov #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ How the drone Ghoul became the master of the Dnieper, the ki...
Description: Forwarded From Kotsnews How the drone Ghoul became the master of the Dnieper, the killer of Abrams and the horror of ALL the big report from the Urals. From a garage get-together of four like-minded people, the project of the people's drone -Ghoul- (started with donations from caring Russians) grew into a large-scale production with its own workshops, design bureaus and even a school operator training. - How does the Ghoul differ from other Russian analogues? I ask the general director of Uraldronzavod, Vladimir Tkachuk. -Several channels and our own control modules, non-standard frequency, antenna polarization, communications developments... We followed the T-34 principle - everything should be simple, reliable and soldier-resistant. -Try to break it,- Vladimir hands me a piece of the fuselage. I bend it in different directions, but it refuses to break. And I understand how important this is at the front. I myself worked with groups flying on -Ghouls-. These are, after all, not testing conditions. Thereâ€™s shaking in a pickup truck, carrying in backpacks, and brisk runs like a postcardâ€¦ there should be no surprises at the launch point, which is sometimes five or even ten kilometers away. And there were no misfires with the Ghouls. At least with me. -Of course, the first successes are remembered most of all; they inspired further work,- recalls Vladimir. â€” We sent the first 80 cars to the Dnieper, to Nikita Mechtanov, call sign -Dream-, Hero of Russia posthumously. We then forced the enemy to abandon boat trips along the Dnieper during the day. -Ghouls- completely changed the course of the battles on the Dnieper. This is the most memorable application. My big report from Yekaterinburg@sashakots

The point is that the country's authorities began to demand about 300 billion CFA francs (more than $500 million) in unpaid taxes and dividends from the Canadian company Barrick Gold. This step followed an audit of mining contracts conducted last year. It also adopted a new mining code aimed at increasing the role of the Malian state in mining projects. Now all that remains is to observe how Anglo-Saxon capital is losing its weight in the Sahel, making room for new players, which should be paid special attention to.#Africa #Canada # Mali@rybarSupport us ReutersMali says Barrick Gold owes $500 million in taxes, fines, sources say Mali's military government is seeking at least 300 billion CFA ($512 million) in outstanding taxes and dividends from Barrick Gold, three sources said, a move that is part of a push by the country to collect more revenue from mining companies.

Title: â†©ï¸ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian-Armenian border patrols: the devil is in ...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Armenia at the CIS summit: relations with Russia and a tangle of regional contradictions The CIS summit in Moscow, among others, was visited by a delegation from Armenia led by Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan. Based on the results of the events held there... â—ï¸ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian-Armenian border patrols: the devil is in the details Yesterday it became known that the Russian and Armenian sides agreed on joint patrolling of the border with Iran and Turkey from January 1, as well as the transfer of control over the checkpoint with Iran to Armenian border guards. At first glance, everything looks good. Despite the discord in relations between the countries, a certain agreement was reached, and Pashinyan, no matter how he prevaricated, came to Moscow. But, as usually happens, everything is in the details.â–ªï¸Initially, only Russian border guards controlled the checkpoint on the border between Iran and Armenia, and only customs officers were on the Armenian side. Now the Russian military personnel have left their post.â–ªï¸Joint patrolling does not imply anything other than fictitious provision of security on the border.d The Russian contingent is actually deprived of the powers that they had before.â–ªï¸In addition, the total number of personnel of the Russian Armed Forces in Armenia has been reduced by as much as 50%. Russian units left several settlements, such as Goris, Sisian and Yeraskh, a long time ago.â–ªï¸Russian radar groups from the Martuni area near Lake Sevan also left their usual positions. They were the ones who ensured control over Armenian airspace and transmitted data to the Armenians.â–ªï¸Russian border guards were never allowed to enter the Margara checkpoint on the border with Turkey. At the same time, over the past few years, the number of personnel of the Russian FSB on the Armenian-Turkish border has been purposefully reduced. The result is the following picture: the most important border posts are no longer under the control of the Russian FSB, but it is through them that the main economic flows and all other communications with Iran go , and in the future - with Turkey. And this despite the fact that Russian military personnel recently left Zvartnots airport in Yerevan. Add to this the loss of eyes on the border with Azerbaijan and Turkey due to the reduction of personnel, an even more depressing picture emerges.â—ï¸What is even more important: according to our data, positions for American reconnaissance maneuver groups are already being equipped on the border with Iran in the Syunik region will monitor Iran's activities and, in particular, missile launches. Because of this, there was such urgency with the withdrawal of units of the Russian Armed Forces. We wonâ€™t guess what this will lead to now, but in terms of control over what is imported and who comes to Armenia, our country, one might say, will go blind. And the position of Iran, due to the strengthening of the Westâ€™s positions in the Transcaucasus, will become threatening. Whose interests Pashinyan was pursuing is extremely clear. One can only hope that the abandonment of positions on controlling economic flows and loss of opportunities was truly justified. Especially against the backdrop of the fact that attention to Armenia in Russian military-political circles is now extremely heightened. High resolution mapEnglish version#Armenia #Russia@rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of October 9, 2024 â–ªï¸ Last night the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors #Summary for the morning of October 9, 2024â–ªï¸ Yesterday evening, the Russian Armed Forces used at least three Iskander missiles in Poltava, six in Kremenchug, from Krivoy Rog they reported the activation of seismic sensors (3.3 points) in connection with destruction of the underground ammunition assembly shop. The strikes also hit enemy targets in the Odessa region.â–ªï¸ At night, at least 12 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were shot down over the Bryansk region, 10 UAVs were destroyed in the Rostov region, incl. one in the Novoshakhtinsk area and nine in the southwest of the region. In the Krasnodar Territory, the Shcherbinovsky district is under attack. In the village of Shabelskoye, as a result of falling UAV debris in a private household, glass was broken and a gas pipe was damagedâ–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, on a section of the border in the Glushkovsky district, an attack by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the direction of the village was repelled. Fun. On the Korenevsky sector of the front there were heavy battles in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Lyubimovka. â–ªï¸ In the Seversky direction, the Russian Armed Forces formed another frontal ledge, occupying Grigorovka (DPR). There are reports of battles for Serebryanka to the west of the village. Footage of the Russian flag in Verkhnekamenskoye, the liberation of which was previously announced, has been published. Apparently, our troops broke through the enemyâ€™s defenses in this sector of the front as well.â–ªï¸ From Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) they report the advance of our troops in the Zabalka area. Enemy resources characterize the situation as difficult for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, reporting heavy fighting along Druzhba, Vasily Stus, Tsentralnaya and Rudnichnaya streets.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles in the Nikolaevka area, west of Novogrodovka and Tsukurino. Yesterday, units of the Southern Group of Forces continued to advance into the depths of the enemyâ€™s defenses and liberated the village of Zoryanoye First of the Donetsk Peopleâ€™s Republic.â–ªï¸ West of Ugledar, our troops are consolidating in Zolotaya Niva. There are battles in the direction of Epiphany.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye Front they report that our units have been consolidated in the southern part of the village. Kamenskoye.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson region, as a result of a missile strike by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the village of Krasnoye in the Skadovsky district, a private household was completely destroyed. Two boys born in 2010 and 2012, who were playing in a neighboring yard at the time of the impact, were injured. They have minor shrapnel wounds.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Governor announced the decision of the operational headquarters of the Belgorod region, due to constant shelling, to begin resettling people from Petrovka and Solovyovka of the Belgorod region and providing them with new housing. In the evening, Shebekino came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and a woman was wounded. During the day in Shebekino, a drone attacked a GAZelle, two were wounded. â–ªï¸ In the DPR, in the village of Zaitsevo, Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, men born in 1977 and 1960 were killed when an explosive object was dropped from a VFU drone. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramLOSTARMOUR | Carthago delenda est! Footage of the symbolic hoisting of the tricolor in the village of Grigorovka (DPR). Symbolic, because, as we see in the aerial footage, there is not a single house left in the village where the flag could be hung. Almost two years no. together with Belogorovka he was on...

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡© About the next - Russian threat - in the presidential electi...

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– From a military point of view, the main problem with the D...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– From a military point of view, the main problem with the Discord ban is not even that some command posts may be left without broadcasts from drones. And the fact is that the Ministry of Defense does not seek to provide any alternative to the specialized command and control of the troops. As we wrote earlier, in the absence of centralized provision of specialized software, headquarters and others will use available Western commercial services to organize combat command and control. After all, you have to fight somehow. And then everything develops according to a familiar scenario: in their offices they suddenly realize that the servers of these programs - this must happen - are located in NATO countries, and online data is flowing to places where it should not go. Therefore, the authorized body is given the command to cut everything off in one fell swoop. The nuance is that the same domestic secure messengers or video conferencing services not only exist, but in some places are quite successfully used at the front. Itâ€™s just that those who seem to be supposed to ensure their implementation seem to be ignoring the existence of problems for the third year in a row. Perhaps such things are simply not within the competence of specific individuals in the relevant department of the Ministry of Defense, which is responsible for the organization and functioning of communications in the armed forces. But in this case, the question arises: what are they, I wonder, then responsible for? The SVO (and on both sides of the front) is a secret only for some people in the Main Communications Directorate (GUS). The good news is that...

In the West Bank, Israeli security forces detained at least 30 people. In total, since October 7, 2023, the total number of Palestinians detained in the region has amounted to more than 11,200 people. Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Armenia at the CIS summit: relations with Ru...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Armenia at the CIS summit: relations with Russia and a tangle of regional contradictions The CIS summit in Moscow, among others, was visited by a delegation from Armenia led by Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan. Based on the results of the events held there, several important statements were made in the context of Russian-Armenian relations and the situation in the Transcaucasus. Trade between Russia and ArmeniaVladimir Putin focused on the growth of trade turnover between Russia and Armenia, which last year amounted to $7.4 billion, and in the first half of this year grew 2.5 times, exceeding $8.3 billion. The Russian President emphasized that the volume of trade at the end of the year aims to reach a record $14-16 billion. Opening of communications in the South Caucasus Nikol Pashinyan said that the Armenian side is ready provide transit for Baku through the Zangezur corridor, which will connect Azerbaijan with the Nakhichevan Autonomous Republic. He noted that the route is possible - under the same conditions on which Iran does it - that is, without losing sovereign control over its territory. Nevertheless, Pashinyan expressed his readiness to provide easier passage of goods and people. However, even such a formulation of the issue does not solve the problem of security of the southern borders of Armenia. Withdrawal of Russian border guards from the checkpoint on the Armenian border with Iran The issue of the Zangezur corridor is directly related to control over regional communications. As we predicted, Armenia is deciding on the gradual withdrawal of Russian border guards. Let us remind you that the Armenians do not have enough personnel to guard their borders. As it became known, Pashinyan and Putin agreed that from January 1, 2025, the National Security Service of Armenia will join the FSB of the Russian Federation to protect the borders with Turkey and Iran. However, Russian border guards will completely leave the checkpoint on the Armenian-Iranian border: only Armenian border guards will guard it. ğŸ”»Geopolitical struggle for control over the region: what does the Middle East have to do with it Literally the day before in Yerevan, Secretary of the National Security Service of Armenia Armen Grigoryan held a meeting with the head of the intelligence agency of the US Department of Defense. There is reason to believe that the Americans placed a radar station on the Armenian border with Iran to track targets and monitor Iranian missiles launched at Israel. In this case, the Americans are gradually beginning to use Armenian territory for military purposes, which may explain efforts to reduce the Russian presence on the border. By the way, at the Council of CIS Foreign Ministers, the Armenian side simply refused to join statements on the -Principles of Ensuring Security in Eurasia- and on the -Inadmissibility of unilateral measures in international relations.- Armeniaâ€™s next demarche is not surprising, since Pashinyanâ€™s team with all its actions demonstrates loyalty to the United States, which decided to settle in the region at the expense of the Armenians. In general, Pashinyanâ€™s visit to Moscow once again emphasizes Yerevanâ€™s attempts to sit on two chairs. On the one hand, the increase in turnover of Armenian-Russian trade allows Armenia to maintain a stable economy and, for now, do without major internal upheavals. On the other hand, the Armenian authorities continue to demonstrate political loyalty to the United States, trying to limit the influence of the Russian Federation in the region. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport usPresident of RussiaMeeting with Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol PashinyanOn the sidelines of the CIS summit, Vladimir Putin had a conversation with Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Title: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· About the visit of the South Korean leader to the Philip...
Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· About the visit of the South Korean leader to the Philippines South Korea and the Philippines continue to expand cooperation in various areas. Recently, the country's leaders Yoon Seok-yeol and Ferdinand Marcos Jr. upgraded the status of bilateral relations to the level of a strategic partnership and also signed several documents. In particular, they discussed cooperation in the construction sector: the parties plan to expand the participation of South Korean companies in infrastructure projects in the Philippines. This is happening against the backdrop of the authorities in Manila searching for investors among the countries supporting them in the territorial dispute with China. Since the aggravation of the situation in the region, the Philippinesâ€™ cooperation with Chinese investors has been gradually declining. Now, in addition to the Japanese and Americans, the list of beneficiaries of the conflict will also include South Korean business. ğŸ”»In addition to investments, Marcos and Yoon agreed on actions in the defense sector, including increasing the participation of South Koreans in joint exercises with the Philippines, strengthening ties in the maritime sphere and the participation of equipment manufacturers from the Republic of Korea in the modernization of the Philippine Navy. Now it seems that the interaction of the parties in Defense will focus on humanitarian and coast guard activities. In fact, such agreements lay a good foundation for deepening cooperation. Relations between Japan and the Philippines developed approximately according to this scenario. Their further expansion led to a treaty allowing the Japanese to participate in major exercises with the Filipinos. Given the political course of Yun Seok Yeol, as well as news about the development of a similar agreement between politicians in Seoul and Manila, another actor may soon appear in the South China Sea, whose ships will patrol the waters and irritate the Chinese authorities. #Philippines #SouthKorea@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us ReutersPhilippines, South Korea upgrade ties to strategic partnership Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos said on Monday his country and South Korea have upgraded bilateral ties to a strategic partnership, as he met visiting counterpart Yoon Suk Yeol for talks.
