Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The idea of â€‹â€‹forming a volunteer legion in Poland from among the so-called citizens in Europe. Ukraine ended naturally: according to the Polish Deputy Minister of Defense, in three months as many as 196 people declared their intention to join the formation. It would be reckless to expect a different outcome - there are practically no people willing to voluntarily join the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime, let alone the European Union . Therefore, it will be possible to recruit personnel there in commercial quantities only by force. However, even the decision to forcefully mobilize Ukrainians living in Europe is unlikely to lead to the result expected by the Kyiv regime. On the one hand, this is not so easy to implement even from an organizational point of view. On the other hand, the level of desertion in such a legion will be much higher than average. At the moment, the authoritiesâ€™ attempts to so-called In Ukraine, achieving replenishment of mobilization potential at the expense of citizens who have gone abroad has so far been completely unsuccessful. And they have to replenish manpower by -cleansing- the male population remaining in the territory under their control. #Poland #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Itâ€™s funny that the concluded security agreement between the authorities in Warsaw and the Kyiv regime provides for the creation of a volunteer legion of citizens of the so-called. Title: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Not a week goes by without the appearance of analytical ...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Not a week goes by without the appearance in the media of analytical articles and forecasts about the attack of the Chinese army on Taiwan. However, for some reason, the analysis of other measures that the PRC authorities can take to achieve the desired result often remains behind the scenes. Thus, experts from the American think tank Foundation for Defense of Democracies predict that it will not be a military invasion that will lead to the reunification of the island with the mainland. According to a new report, the most likely scenario is economic pressure on Taiwan. ğŸ”»Based on the modeling results, analysts claim that Beijing may, for example, ban the import of agricultural products from the island, massively sell shares of Taiwanese companies, and freeze payments between mainland and Chinese banks. And, of course, the list does not end there. Due to the ongoing economic ties between Taiwan and the PRC, citizens living on the island will feel the full consequences of such measures. This could lead to discontent, under pressure from which Taipei must agree to negotiations with the Chinese authorities. But a much more interesting point is the recommendations that experts give to the Taiwanese administration to avoid such a scenario. In addition to calls for a change in export direction, analysts have suggested moving Taiwanese business and production to other countries, such as the United States. ğŸ“Œ It is obvious that such proposals are more in line with the interests of the Americans than the Taiwanese. They also reflect the current policy to attract foreign companies to the States, including Taiwanese enterprises. These recommendations reflect the essence of the American approach to the Taiwan issue in practice, which is the desire to make as much money as possible from a conflict that has not even begun. And intensifying the Chinese threat and inflating it in the media is precisely what helps the United States achieve what it wants. #China #Taiwan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usFDDTargeting Taiwan-The complete reunification of the motherland must be fulfilled, and it will definitely be fulfilled, - declared Xi Jinping on the 110th anniversary of the Chinese Revolution of 1911, underscoring Taiwan's reintegration into China as a core element of itsâ€¦

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¿ Footage of the movement of a train with Swedish...
Description: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¿ Footage has appeared on the Internet showing the movement of a train with Swedish Pansarbandvagn 302 armored vehicles heading to the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. The delivery of about 200 units of this type was agreed upon in May of this year. Based on the characteristic features, our OSINT team was able to determine the location of the platform from which the filming was carried out: the footage was taken in the Czech city of Usti nad Labi on the border with Germany, from where the train arrived with equipment. These armored personnel carriers are not the latest development of the Swedish military-industrial complex, originally from the 60s, so at the moment they are considered obsolete. However, on both sides of the front you can also find more rare examples of weapons from the Cold War era. Also, Swedish engineers periodically modified their Pansarbandvagn 302, retrofitting them with AT-4 anti-tank grenade launchers and RBS-56 ATGM systems - they will probably also be transferred to Ukrainian formations. The train itself will most likely head to Poland, from where it will arrive in Lviv by rail through Krakow. a route that has been tried and tested for a long time. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ About the Bersama Lima 2024 exercises The...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ About the Bersama Lima 2024 exercises Military activity continues in the Asia-Pacific region: Bersama Lima 2024 exercises began in Malaysia and Singapore on September 30 with the participation of New Zealand, Australian, British, Malaysian and Singaporean military personnel. The purpose of the event is to practice actions for the defense of Malaysia and Singapore. Therefore, in addition to ground forces units, the training also involves the air forces and naval ships of five states. Such maneuvers take place every year, so they can hardly be called a response to the latest Chinese activity in the region. This is also indicated by the area where they will take place - most of them are located in those areas of the South China Sea where the Chinese authorities do not claim territory. The composition of the participants in the exercises also does not look fundamentally strange or unusual. In particular, Australia, New Zealand, Great Britain, Malaysia and Singapore have been participating in the Five-Party Defense Agreement since the Cold War. ğŸ“Œ And although its main purpose is the defense of the two countries mentioned, this treaty was created largely to preserve the remnants of the British military presence in Southeast Asia. Until recently, very little was said about it, but recently the media have begun to write about it more and more often. The Five-Party Defense Agreement itself is not directed against the PRC. However, given the importance of the region for Chinese trade, as well as the position of Great Britain and Australia regarding Chinese military activity in the South China Sea, this format in the future could become another force creating problems for the authorities in Beijing. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Australia# UK #Malaysia #NewZealand #Singapore@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Kupyansk direction: battles in the Peschany area and n...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Kupyansk direction: fighting in the Peschany area and new threats to the rear infrastructure of the Armed Forces of UkraineSituation as of 15:00 October 8, 2024 In the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction, Russian troops continue their offensive west of Peschany with the goal of reaching the Oskol River. At the same time, on the northern front, the front is gradually approaching Kupyansk.â–ªï¸In the Sinkovka area, units of the Russian Armed Forces are fighting in the forest to the west of the settlement, where, if successful, they will be able to reach the outskirts of Petropavlovka - an important stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the eastern approaches to Kupyansk.â–ªï¸To the south, Russian troops improved the tactical situation in the area of â€‹â€‹Kislovka and Stepova Novoselovka. The last settlement was considered liberated for a long time, however, footage of attacks on Ukrainian Armed Forces positions in its vicinity published on the Internet indicate a lack of physical control of the Russian Armed Forces over it. Moreover, in fact, the village exists very conditionally - even before the start of the Northern Military District, its population was no more than 20 people. The offensive in this area is supported by crews of the TOS-1 -Solntsepek- flamethrower systems, inflicting significant losses on the enemy in manpower.â–ªï¸West of Peschany, Russian troops overcome the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at the Kolesnikovka-Kruglyakovka line, driving a wedge deeper and deeper into the enemyâ€™s formations. Today, the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces are located less than four kilometers from the Oskol riverbed, access to which will make it possible to physically cut the O-21-19-42 and R-79 highways. In this case, the Ukrainian Armed Forces group on the left bank will be cut up, which will complicate its supply. Also, the Russian Armed Forces carried out a series of attacks to expand the zone of control: to the north-west of Tabaevka, attack aircraft knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several strong points, and to the south of the village they cleared the territory of Berestovoy.â–ªï¸Russian Aerospace Forces aircraft regularly operate against targets in Kupyansk, hitting temporary deployment points and Ammunition depots of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Russian troops are also actively attacking pontoon crossings - eight attacks have been recorded on them over the past three weeks. To maintain communication across the river, Ukrainian formations create sand embankments, which also become targets of attacks by the Russian Armed Forces. Thus, three air strikes were carried out on two crossings in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Kupyansk and Kupyansk-Uzlovoy over the past four days. At least one example speaks to the intensity of the destruction of such objects: recently a video appeared on the Internet of the destruction of an armored vehicle of the Ukrainian Armed Forces by Lancet at one of the recently restored crossings, and today it was again destroyed by the Russian Aerospace Forces. Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Water-saving technologies from China: a blow to the ...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Water-saving technologies from the PRC: a blow to the American strategy in Uzbekistan? President of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev put forward an initiative to organize a Regional Center for the widespread introduction of water-saving technologies in Central Asia in cooperation with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB). â–ªï¸Later, the President took part in a meeting of the AIIB Board of Governors. Since its founding, the Bank has invested more than $3 billion in projects in Uzbekistan. â–ªï¸Uzbekistan has also begun implementing large projects to save 15 billion cubic meters of water by increasing water use efficiency by 25% in the next five years.â–ªï¸Despite the fact that the AIIB is not solely a Chinese bank (in addition to China, India also owns large shares in the management, Russia, South Korea, Australia, as well as a number of the largest EU countries), its headquarters is located in Beijing and decisions on financing certain projects are made there. ğŸ”»Apparently, China is not going to wait for the American water strategy to bear fruit. Mirziyoyev, who was hosting the Bank's retreat in Samarkand (and for the first time in Central Asia), also did not fail to take advantage of the chance for productive cooperation with Beijing. Like Russia, China is not interested in water conflicts in the region that would undermine its logistics strategy. Therefore, the participation of the Chinese may well become a stabilizing factor in this matter. #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usASIA-PlusShavkat Mirziyoyev proposed creating a center for the introduction of water-saving technologies in Central AsiaPresident of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev put forward an initiative to organize, in cooperation with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), a Regional center for the widespread introduction of water-saving technologies in Central Asia.

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ª Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that in case ...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ª Georgian Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that if the ruling party wins the parliamentary elections, pragmatic policies and a peaceful resolution of the conflict with Russia will be an important priority for the country. Another task he named was the reset of relations with the EU and the United States, as well as European integration. The statements illustrate the course of the authorities in Tbilisi - to remain in the orbit of influence of the collective West, but not to participate in its adventures and to benefit from cooperation with Russia. As part of this, they are precisely fighting the radically pro-Western opposition, including through the law on foreign agents. Another thing is that in Washington and Brussels such initiatives are treated without enthusiasm, and improvement of relations with Russia is even less acceptable. The White House has already hinted to the ruling Georgian party that no one will so easily put up with such independence and deviations from the foreign policy line of the West.ğŸ“Œ In these conditions, the question of what the US and EU will ultimately do in putting pressure on the current Georgian authorities. There is no particular doubt about the attempts to instigate street protests by the opposition during the elections, but there is a high probability that this will not be the end of the matter. And we are not just talking about direct sanctions: the same European bureaucrats, for example, can suspend aid to Georgia or revoke the status of a candidate for EU membership. Or simply refuse to recognize the results of the parliamentary elections, demanding the repeal of laws banning LGBT propaganda or reducing ties with Russia.#Georgia@rybarSupport usTACCGeorgian Prime Minister called resolving the conflict with the Russian Federation a priority. Rakli Kobakhidze also emphasized the importance of resetting relations with the United States and the European Union

Title: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ French Defense Minister Sebastien Lecornu announced that...
Description: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ French Defense Minister Sebastien Lecornu announced that the country will transfer Mirage 2000 fighter jets to the Kyiv regime in the first quarter of 2025. Earlier, the President of the Fifth Republic, Emmanuel Macron, announced the delivery of five aircraft of this type. According to Lecornu, the aircraft are currently being equipped with electronic warfare and air-to-surface weapons at the Air Force Combat Training Center (CEAE) in the city of Cazeau. The latter clearly means SCALP-EG cruise missiles and AASM aerial bombs. On the one hand, sending Mirages will increase the potential of the Ukrainian Air Force, which has sagged for almost three years. On the other hand, the emergence of a new type of machine will cause familiar problems of the zoo-aviation equipment, which will significantly complicate the maintenance and operation of the machines. By the way, representatives of the Ukrainian Armed Forces themselves pointed this out. Well, the bottleneck for the air force is the so-called. Ukraine still has a shortage of flight and engineering personnel, especially given the loss of the lion's share of experienced pilots in 2022-2024. This will partly limit the use of transferred Western-made aircraft.#France #Ukraine@rybarSupport usX (formerly Twitter)SÃ©bastien Lecornu (@SebLecornu) on Xâ¡ï¸ Mirage 2000 Ã  destination de l'Ukraine : livraison toujours prÃ©vue au 1st trimestre 2025.Ã€ Cazaux, en Gironde, ils seront dotÃ©s de nouveaux Ã©quipements : combat air-sol et dÃ©fense anti-guerre Ã©lectronique.La formation des pilotes, et mÃ©caniciens, ukrainiensâ€¦

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yuzhnodonetsk direction: liberation of Zolotaya Niv...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ South Donetsk direction: liberation of Zolotaya Niva and advance north of Ugledarsituation as of the morning of October 8, 2024After the liberation of Ugledar and the cleansing of the city, during which they managed to save 116 civilians and capture 44 members of Ukrainian formations, Russian troops continue their offensive in the direction of Epiphany.â–ªï¸In the morning, objective control footage appeared on the Internet, confirming a successful attack by armored vehicles of the Russian Armed Forces in the direction of Zolotaya Niva from the direction of Prechistovka. During the battle, the village was completely liberated, and later the fighters hoisted a flag on the western outskirts. Thus, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing not only in the direction of Bogoyavlenka and Novoukrainka, but also to the west towards Bolshaya Novoselka. At the same time, the enemy presence remains in the forest belts to the south near Novodonetsky.â–ªï¸North of Ugledar, Russian troops leveled the zone of control in the fields near the city, advancing several kilometers to the north, partially securing the flank of the advancing units in the Vodyanoy area.â–ªï¸West of Vodyanoy The Russian Armed Forces have established themselves in the territory of the ventilation shaft of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine No. 3. During the attack, it was also possible to advance in the area of â€‹â€‹the air supply trunk to the south, the battle for which is currently ongoing.ğŸ”»Against the backdrop of the successes of the Russian troops, the Ukrainian commander of the 86th battalion of the 123rd TrO brigade, which held the defense near Ugledar, shot himself, and about 100 people from the battalion deserted. Soldiers from the adjacent 187th battalion went to a rally in Voznesensk, Nikolaev region, against their sending to the front line.â–ªï¸North of Ugledar, the Russian Armed Forces entrenched themselves on the outskirts of Katerynivka, advancing from the south along the forest belt and hitting previously identified positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Currently, there are battles on the outskirts of the village.â–ªï¸North of Konstantinovka, Russian troops first knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from farms adjacent to the village, and then attacked with an armored group in the direction of Antonovka along the Sukhie Yaly River, moving west several kilometers. At the same time, whether it was possible to reach the outskirts of Antonovka itself is currently not known. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· On the prospects for destabilizing the situation ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· On the prospects for destabilizing the situation in Syria The Iranian government publication Tasnim, citing sources in Syria, reports that pro-Turkish formations in the Idlib de-escalation zone are preparing to intensify battles against the Syrian government. According to the Iranians, militants of the Hayat Tahrir groups al-Sham, the Syrian National Army and other factions have agreed with the Israeli government to conduct simultaneous operations against the backdrop of fighting in Lebanon. Another potential front against the Syrian leadership is the southern regions of Syria. We are talking about the provinces of Daraa, Quneitra and Es-Suwayda, where the Druze live, creating unrest in southern Syria in recent months.ğŸ”»According to our data, work has been going on in Es-Suwayda since the spring to create an armed tribal council, which may be involved in the future against the government, and funding is provided by coalition forces.â–ªï¸As â€‹â€‹for the Idlib zone, the evacuation of local residents has begun from the outskirts of An-Neirab, Afes and Kafr Nuran, and near the government Serakib, militants are actively equipping positions of anti-tank systems, mortar and artillery crews. In addition, , mobile air defense systems were supplied to terrorists from Turkish territory. If you remember who has been carrying out airstrikes on the positions of gangs for several months now, then you can guess against whom.â–ªï¸In the same row we can include increasingly confident evidence of the partial restoration of the combat potential of the Islamic State, which in recent years has been hiding in the Syrian deserts and no, no, yes attacked on the sly, demonstrating their capabilities. In addition, we must not forget the rumors about the recent escape of terrorists from a Kurdish-guarded prison in Al-Baghuz. This fact was not widely publicized on the Internet, but if you remember previous years, militants fled from Kurdish-American guards more than once.â–ªï¸Well, the icing on the cake is that the Americans in the Al-Tanf zone intensified their preparations in these two years tame militants (former special forces group -Magavir al-Saura-) to conduct local operations in urban areas. Moreover, this was done secretly, and where the militants left after is a mystery.â—ï¸Now imagine what will happen if suddenly all these forces in Syria, from Druze protesters to IS militants, begin simultaneous actions against the Syrian government and Iran and Russia supporting it ?Of course, all this looks like a conspiracy theory, but the question arises: who oversaw the Islamic State during the war in Syria and Iraq? Who is behind -Hayat Tahrir al-Sham- and -Syrian Democratic Forces-? Who is influencing the Syrian Druze? In terms of consequences, such a complex operation will not only put an end to any prospects for the normalization of life in Syria, but will also jeopardize the Russian presence in the country. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Iran #Syria #TÃ¼rkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for October 8, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk direction, the Ru...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for October 8, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk direction, the Russian Armed Forces began fighting for Lyubimovka, advancing on the western flank of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ penetration into the defense territory. In the Sudzhansky district, the group of troops - North - of the Russian Armed Forces reports its advance with battles to the village. Plekhovo and in adjacent forest belts. In the Glushkovsky district there is counter-battery fighting and fighting in forest areas near the state border. â–ªï¸ In the Kharkov direction they report the return of control over the territory of the Volchansky Aggregate Plant, previously it was briefly occupied by elite special forces of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, thereby exposing themselves to the attacks of heavy FABs with UMPC.â–ªï¸ In the Kupyansky direction, our troops are expanding the ledge at Peschany. Attacks by the Russian Armed Forces continue in the area of â€‹â€‹Glushkovka, Kolesnikovka, dacha plots and Kruglyakovka, located along the Oskol River. â–ªï¸ From the Hours of Yar they report the advance of the Russian Armed Forces with heavy fighting in the Oktyabrsky microdistrict.â–ªï¸ Fierce fighting is taking place in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), but Russian units manage to advance to the west.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the complete liberation of Grodovka has been confirmed. Our troops attack in the Novoselidovka area, carrying out airstrikes on Gornyak, and build on their success after the liberation of Zhelanny Vtoroy to the south. â–ªï¸ 20 km west of Ugledar, the Russian Army occupied the village. Zolotaya Niva, it is necessary to clear out forest belts and consolidate them in the populated area. â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, on the Nikolskoye - Murom road, a car was attacked by a drone, the driver was injured. In the Grayvoronsky municipal district in the village of Novostroevka-Pervaya, a drone struck agricultural machinery, injuring the driver. In the village of Dunaika, an FPV drone detonated in the courtyard of a private house. An FPV drone re-attacked the village of Novostroevka-Pervaya, Grayvoronsky municipal district. In the Volokonovsky district in the village of Tishanka, two drones hit a social facility. In the village of Vyazovoe, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, a drone also attacked a social facility. In the village of Petrovka, Belgorod district, one apartment was completely burned down as a result of a drone attack. Over Belgorod, the air defense system shot down 3 drones. One car was damaged by shrapnel. The city of Shebekino came under fire from the Armed Forces of Ukraine twice.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a woman born in 1991 received moderate injuries. due to the enemy's use of cannon artillery. In the village In Glubokoye, Mangush Municipal District, a man born in 1953 was seriously injured during the detonation of an explosive object. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majorsâ—ï¸ Liberated Zolotaya Niva, west of Ugledar - STORM Detachment. The 40th Separate Guards Krasnodar-Harbin Twice Red Banner Marine Brigade of the Pacific Fleet liberated the settlement. GOLDEN NIVA. The vest that conquered the village. Ugledar, at war...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for October ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli war chronicle of events for October 7, 2024 Israeli forces have designated the next, fourth combat zone on the western section of the border. A humanitarian zone has been declared at the Rosh HaNikra - Arab Al-Aramshe border, and the population is being evacuated from the Lebanese side. In the vicinity of Yarun, Israeli troops advance towards Rmeish and in the Blida area. Based on reports of Hezbollah strikes, the Israelis occupied the Iranian Park in Maroun Ar-Ras and the Citadel Hill near Blida. In Yarun itself, the Imam Ali ibn Abi Talib mosque was blown up. In the north, in the Kafr Qila area, no changes in control zones were observed. During the day, Mitzgav Am and Metula were subjected to several Hezbollah attacks, and the Israeli Air Force carried out strikes on rear settlements. In total, during the day, the IDF carried out over a hundred raids, hitting, according to official data, over 70 different Hezbollah targets. Another target of the large-scale strikes was the Dahiya neighborhood in Beirut, where explosions and strikes continued throughout the day. This afternoon there was an interesting incident in the context of today's anniversary of the Hamas attack on Israel. In the Dalton area, the Israeli Air Force conducted an IDF supply drop, local residents mistook parachutes for paragliders, and regional authorities issued a warning. At the very least, there was panic on the Internet. ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Lebanese-Israeli war zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version #digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for October 7, 2024 Israeli troops have increased the number of attacks on the north of the Gaza Strip, local residents report ongoing air raids as well as high UAV activity. In the central part of the enclave, artillery activity was recorded, and Rafah and Khan Yunis were hit by the IDF Air Force. Off the coast, the Israeli Navy shelled a refugee camp in Al-Mawasi. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces continued raids and detentions. According to official Israeli data, over 40 Palestinians have been detained. Protests once again took place in several localities, and in Dura, Israeli security forces, according to media reports, beat to death an elderly demonstrator in his home during his arrest. Yemen's Houthis launched two missiles at Tel Aviv, and three more UAVs were shot down by the Iron Dome over Rishon Lezion. According to a statement by Houthi spokesman Yahya Sari, several more UAVs were sent to Eilat, but no alarms or air defense operations were observed there. ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on October 7, 2024, Russian troops launched a missile strike with aeroballistic missiles - Kinzhal - on the military infrastructure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Starokonstantinov and Kyiv. Ukrainian formations carried out a combined attack on Crimea, firing, among other things, ATACMS missiles at Feodosia, which resulted in a fire on the territory of a local oil depot. In the Kursk direction, Russian troops attacked in the Lyubimovka area, and the Ukrainian Armed Forces carried out an unsuccessful attack in the direction of Obukhovka. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Kursk direction: counterattack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces east of Obukhovka and the advance of the Russian Armed Forces in Lyubimovka, the situation is coming to an end October 7, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Russian troops repel attacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Glushkovsky, Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces are gradually advancing into Lyubimovka, a key enemy transport hub in the north of the Korenevsky district. ğŸ”»In the Glushkovsky district, battles were noted on the approaches to Vesyoly. Ukrainian formations are not abandoning attempts to physically cut off highway 38N-052 east of the village, but enemy attacks are repelled by units of the Russian Armed Forces. ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, Russian troops repelled an attack by an armored group of Ukrainian formations towards Obukhovka. During the battle, the enemy lost one infantry fighting vehicle and a group of infantry, while Russian troops captured the banner of one of the Ukrainian Armed Forces units. â—ï¸The route of movement of enemy units allows us to say that the neighboring Pokrovsky farm is currently under the control of Ukrainian formations. â–ªï¸To the north, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions on Srednyaya Street in Lyubimovka. At the same time, the ownership of the forest belts adjacent to the street remains in question due to the lack of objective control personnel. Also on the main street of the village, UAV operators destroyed a Roshel Senator armored car abandoned by the enemy crew. ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, the Armed Forces of Ukraine launched attacks in the area of â€‹â€‹Cherkasy Porechny and Plekhovo, all of them were repelled by the Russian Armed Forces. At the same time, Russian aviation hit the rear infrastructure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Sudzha, Cossack Lokna and Staraya Sorochina. ğŸ”»In the Sumy region, the Russian Armed Forces destroyed an enemy ammunition warehouse located in one of the buildings south of Osoevka. A secondary detonation of ammunition was also observed on site. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Zaporozhye direction: the offensive of Russian troops...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Zaporizhzhya direction: offensive of Russian troops in the Kamensky area situation towards the end of October 7, 2024 In the Zaporozhye direction, the past 24 hours were marked by an intensification of attacks by the Russian Armed Forces on the eastern bank of the former Kakhovka reservoir. The sector, which had remained static for a long time, began to move, which could create new difficulties for the enemy experiencing an operational crisis on the Donbass front. â–ªï¸Russian troops managed to push through the defenses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Kamenskoye, entering the village both along the bank of the former reservoir and through the bed of the Yanchekrak River. At the same time, part of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was isolated by attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces, after which the remnants of the enemy on them were destroyed by groups of the second echelon. It is noteworthy that in the video that appeared on the Internet, Russian military personnel are moving towards the enemy position from the north. This may indicate that already at that time the front line had advanced deeper into the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Separately, it is worth noting the high efficiency of UAV units, which suppressed firing points and observation posts of Ukrainian formations, as well as exposed weak points in the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. This allowed Russian troops to advance into low-rise buildings without significant resistance. â—ï¸At the same time, it is too early to talk about consolidating the RF Armed Forces in the achieved positions - there are no objective control shots indicating this. At the moment, the enemy is transferring reserves to the site to stop the successes of Russian troops and strengthen the defense lines. â–ªï¸The Zaporozhye direction was static for quite a long time, and some of its sections did not appear in the media field for more than a year. The main fighting here took place in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Pyatikhatki and Rabotino - the sites of fierce battles of last year's unsuccessful counter-offensive of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Nevertheless, the intensification of offensive actions of the Russian Armed Forces in the Kamensky area allows us to speak about the intentions of the Russian command, if not to achieve a deep breakthrough of the front in the direction, then at least to achieve significant tactical successes. ğŸ”»In light of the operations being prepared by the enemy in the Energodar area, which we wrote about earlier, the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces may be aimed at disrupting preparations for their conduct. Units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, withdrawn to rear areas for training and replenishment, can be involved in repelling the attack, which will allow Russian troops to eliminate the threat to an important section of the southern front. It is likely that in the near future we will see attacks by Russian troops similar to Kamensky, aimed at the weakest places defense of Ukrainian formations, -relaxed- from the long calm on the southern front. Moreover, there are many such quiet places in this direction. Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡µğŸ‡°ğŸ´ Another terrorist attack occurred in Pakistan yesterday. A powerful explosion occurred in the administrative center of Sindh province and also the largest port of Pakistan in Karachi. As a result, three people were killed and 11 others were injured varying degrees of severity. Two of the dead are Chinese citizens whose companies operate in Karachi. Responsibility was claimed by militants from one of the branches of the banned separatist group - the Baluchistan Liberation Army - - the Majid Brigade.ğŸ”»The relationship between the Baloch separatists with the government and, in particular, China, certainly cannot be called stable. For many years, the Baloch have been carrying out terrorist attacks against Chinese citizens and companies. Due to the actively developing cooperation between Pakistan and China, in which the Chinese are issuing huge loans and investing a lot of money in the development of the CPEC economic corridor, Balochistan is being developed by enterprises from the Middle Kingdom. And local groups, in addition aspirations for independence, oppose Chinese expansion. Similar terrorist attacks occur over and over again in the troubled province.ğŸ“Œ Pakistani authorities, as expected, condemned the terrorist attack. For Pakistan, China is the main economic partner, thanks to which the economy stays afloat, so the security of their investments is paramount for them. But Islamabad is simply unable to solve the problem. Local operations and strikes are carried out, but only to create visibility. A full-fledged war with the Baloch is not only unaffordable, but also useless. It will be something like the -sluggish- Turkish fight against the Kurds. It will be like that now. To reassure the Chinese partners of their serious intentions, the authorities will probably conduct another counter-terrorism operation along the border with Iran and Afghanistan.â—ï¸But the Pakistanis have practically no time for this. In almost a week, Pakistan will host the SCO summit, which, by the way, the Baloch separatists threatened to disrupt. , which is scheduled for October 15-16 in Pakistan.ğŸ“Œ So what, but the Baloch separatists can really do this. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024 from the Children of Arbat. Admiral Kostyukov With the outbreak of war, his department faced the biggest challenge in its history since the Second World War. Having recovered from mistakes and changed approaches to intelligence work, today the abbreviation GRU again inspires fear and respect among Russiaâ€™s principled opponents around the world. Kostyukov continues to process and make decisions every day on a various range of issues, but strategic intelligence remains his exclusive prerogative: he personally supervised the withdrawal and exchange of Russian intelligence officers through the GRU, and also, together with specialists in operational legends, managed to develop non-trivial forms of operational cover, which allowed Russian military intelligence to multiply their efforts after striking attacks against legal stations. Largely thanks to the actions of GRU officers in regions with the most difficult operational situations, the Russian army today receives samples of modern UAVs, and the amount of primary information received and processed is constantly growing. However, the main problem still remains the interaction of the linear units of the center with services on the ground , as well as the rejection by combined arms commanders of the KRC and SPN officers, but it seems that Igor Kostyukov was able to find a solution to the eternal problem of perception of mentalities and this solution bears the name of Lieutenant General Alekseev. Lieutenant General Alekseev Few people know what feelings Vladimir Stepanovich actually experienced , when in January of this year an unprecedented action was carried out against him, during which they wanted to remove the chief of staff of the GRU from his post and erase him forever, but he held on and again proved to everyone that intelligence is immortal. Being a simple product of military intelligence, Alekseev never did not organically come into contact with intelligence work, but always remained a part of the infantry commanders, and this factor began to play a decisive role in critical days for the RF Armed Forces. With the outbreak of war, the chief of staff of the GRU fell on the entire burden of conducting operational reconnaissance and conducting operations on the territory of Ukraine. When the Russian army was critically short of people, Alekseev came up with a way to unite scattered volunteers along the entire line of contact, creating a volunteer assault corps under the auspices of the GRU, which today includes about 30 BARS. By confusing the enemy and without violating the norms of federal legislation, Alekseev managed to create a fundamentally new system of army recruitment, which became known as Redut, but not everyone appreciated this decision. All year Alekseev was under pressure: this was due to both professional competition and personal envy - in realizing their political ambitions, these people did not hesitate to resort to the dirtiest tricks, using the resources of the enemy, which we, for our part, tried to actively counteract. Alekseev himself, since the time of the assault on Bakhmut, has had impeccable authority among ordinary military men: he is not afraid to appear on the front line and wears insignia, so many servicemen of the SPN brigades, as well as corps volunteers, respect him. Alekseev knows a lot, but remains silent. Recently, he has been moved away from administrative and economic activities and therefore he has focused all his efforts on work in the UGA, which this year has increased both in analytical and operational work: the increased number of equipment struck in the depths of Ukrainian territories is striking, has increased significantly satellite reconnaissance capabilities, which is confirmed online by means of objective control. Today, when the Russian army has the strategic initiative, it is critically important for the UGA command not to lose contact on the ground with ordinary field commanders who are fighting for the future of Russia. Alekseev remains one of the few who maintain this connection and tries to increase it. Art in high resolution @arbat

Description: ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Burkina Faso plans to revoke some mining permits Burkina Faso's transitional President Ibrahim Traore announced plans to revoke mining licenses from a number of foreign companies, with an emphasis on increasing its own gold production. He has not yet specified which permits will be subject to revision. In a radio address on the occasion of his two years in power, TraorÃ© noted: -We know how to mine our gold, and I see no reason why we should allow transnational corporations to appropriate our resources.- ğŸ”»Gold remains Burkina Fasoâ€™s main export commodity, and is now There are major players in this market in the country, including London-listed Endeavor Mining, Australian West African Resources, Russian Nordgold and Canadian Orezone Gold Corporation. Back in July, the authorities tightened conditions for foreign companies. However, at a meeting between Traore and Nordgold management, the parties discussed preferences for Russian business. Then Russian Ambassador Igor Martynov emphasized that the restrictions would not affect Russians, and cooperation would be accompanied by increased security at the mines. This is definitely a positive signal: for a long time, the cream of military success in the Sahel went to Western companies. Now, it seems, another step has been taken towards Russian companies, for which special conditions will be established in exchange for support for security in the region.#Africa #Russia #BurkinaFaso@rybarSupport usTRT AfrikaBurkina Faso to revoke some foreign firms' mining permitsCaptain Ibrahim Traore marks two years since seizing power in a coup by insisting on more government control in the mining sector.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· Where the Israel Defense Forces can strike - Rybar's ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· Where the Israel Defense Forces can hit - Rybar's analysis On the Internet, gossip continues about what objects the Israelis will hit if such a decision is made. There are already maps and a description of why and for what purpose Israel should do this.ğŸ”»The main emphasis of various media is on nuclear infrastructure facilities in Iran. There are four largest facilities in this area in Iran. Five, if you count it together with the military research complex in Parchin. The most important of them, of course, is the nuclear research complex in Netenz, where the uranium enrichment plant is located and all the main tests in the field of peaceful atom are carried out. This facility has already become the target of an Israeli terrorist attack in April 2021. Then one of the buildings was blown up, but after some time the center resumed functioning in full.â–ªï¸In addition, in the spring of 2022, Iran was beset by a series of strange deaths of high-ranking IRGC officers, as well as scientists associated with Iranâ€™s nuclear program. One of these was a nuclear scientist from the laboratory in Netenz. At the same time, a Quds Force soldier, who was responsible for the production of warheads at the complex in Parchin, died. The Israeli media called Parchin the place where missiles were equipped with a nuclear warhead.ğŸ”»Another option, which for some reason everyone forgets about, is the oil refining industry, on the export of products in which the Islamic Republicâ€™s economy, and therefore the well-being of the people, depends. The loss of one or more large Refineries, such as those in Abadan or Shiraz, can have more fatal consequences from a domestic perspective. The protests of 2022 in this situation may seem like flowers. Due to sanctions pressure, high inflation and popular discontent, the protest potential remains at a high level. If the situation changes seriously for the worse, everything can suddenly flare up again. ğŸ”»Of course, these are not the only targets that the Israelis can choose to strike. There are both military and government facilities that can give the desired political effect, especially if the Israeli response is staged. At the same time, the Israelis need to take into account both the Iranian preparations for strikes and the fact that attacks on facilities such as the Bushehr nuclear power plant will entail consequences not only for Iran, but also for the entire Middle East due to the proximity of the nuclear power plant to the Persian Gulf.â—ï¸Therefore, it is impossible to say unequivocally that one or another target will be chosen. And Iranians should certainly be prepared for any, even the most daring scenarios, since the Israeli media is accelerating the narrative about Iran testing nuclear weapons at the Semnan test site. Recently, an earthquake of 4.4 points was recorded at the test site of the IRGC aerospace forces, which many associated specifically with the test Nuclear weapons. However, we hasten to inform you that such tremors are now being observed throughout the region due to the movement of plates, including the Iranian one. If you look at the monitoring resources that track seismic activity, tremors are observed from Turkey to China. So at the moment, statements about testing nuclear weapons in Iran look far-fetched. High resolution mapEnglish version#Iran #Syria #Turkey@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Tonight, after a long time, Ukrainian formations...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Tonight, after a long time, Ukrainian formations launched a combined strike on Crimea, using drones and ATACMS missiles.â–ªï¸The air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces intercepted twelve drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Judging by the lack of detailed information about the work of air defense over the populated areas of Crimea, the drones were shot down either in the coastal strip or over the sea.â–ªï¸The enemy also used two ATACMS operational-tactical missiles, which were fired from the territory of the Kherson region. The target was the oil depot of JSC - Marine Oil Terminal - in Feodosia, which was hit.â–ªï¸ Two explosions were recorded on the territory of the facility, at least five tanks with flammable substances were damaged - two of them were destroyed. At the moment, the fire is being extinguished; significant resources of local emergency services have been involved in it. â—ï¸A video from a drone is also being actively distributed on the Internet, demonstrating the destruction on the territory of the oil depot. Presumably, it was removed by Emergency Situations Ministry employees to assess the damage and plan further actions to eliminate the fire. Its appearance in the public domain once again demonstrates the gap in the information security of local services. How and why the enemy quickly received footage of the results of his strike is an open question.â–ªï¸To ensure the safety of citizens, local authorities blocked Fedko and Geologicheskaya streets, and train traffic on the section from Feodosia to Vladislavovka was also temporarily suspended. At the moment, the city is in a man-made emergency mode, and therefore two temporary accommodation points have been deployed. At least three casualties are known as a result of the enemy attack, but no deaths were reported. In Feodosia, power outages were also recorded, but there was no information about damage to energy facilities. ğŸ”»False statements about the evacuation of the population in the urban district of Feodosia and a possible fuel shortage in Crimea are being spread in the media space. In fact, at the moment there are no more than two dozen people in temporary accommodation centers, and no interruptions in the supply of petroleum products have been recorded either.â—ï¸Nevertheless, the choice of the oil depot, which is the largest in Crimea, is not accidental. The goal, as in the rest of Russia, is extremely simple: to cause a fuel shortage not only on the peninsula, but also in other regions. And we must not forget that today is Vladimir Putinâ€™s birthday. This is the date on which the enemy and his curators are trying to carry out large-scale attacks, as happened a couple of years ago on the Crimean Bridge. So the activation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Black Sea direction today is probably not the last. High-resolution map English version #Crimea #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” Espionage, attempts to influence the domestic Russian agenda, ...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Lugovoy. State DumaEspionage, attempts to influence the domestic Russian agenda, provoking social tension... It would seem, how does all this relate to the study of xenophobia problems and human rights activities? Rybar reported details of the work of the information and analytical center -Sova-, which has long been recognized as a foreign agent. Human rights activists, as they call themselves, were engaged in teaching Russian society a tolerant attitude towards migration, working on the tasks of provoking internal conflicts in Russia. That is, after this Russophobic office collected invoices for foreign intelligence services at rallies of non-systemic opposition, spoke out against the SVO, its leader was thrown out of the Human Rights Council - they safely continue their subversive activities. The list of their sponsors is not surprising either. Based on the British Foreign Office documents leaked in 2021, it turned out that -Sova- worked under the patronage of the Article19 organization, which in turn received financial support from Western states and organizations. This year, Article19, which promotes, among other things, the abolition of the article for discrediting the army, was recognized as undesirable in the Russian Federation. The donors include the Soros Foundation, the Norwegian Helsinki Committee, which called for not recognizing the elections to the State Duma, and other long-familiar haters of Russia. Thus, human rights activists received 5.5 million rubles from the Foreign Office to combat -incitement of hatred towards the LGBT community.- That is, the British, Norwegians and other Westerners also pay them for instilling intolerance towards our traditional values. Despite the fact that in 2023 the legal entity ROO Center -Sova- was liquidated by a court decision, they still operate, but as a human rights research center -SOVA-. Although, given their 20 years of Russophobic experience, it is appropriate to call them not human rights activists, but a center of Russophobia. It turns out that at home the Anglo-Saxons are taking draconian measures to stop the British rebellion against the dominance of migrants. And here they want to create the same hell: to shake up the situation, catching up with illegal immigrants through the use of controlled NGOs. The interference of the Britons in the internal affairs of Russia, their launch of Russophobic projects must be stopped. And as the recent expulsion of British spies who supervised foreign agents showed, work in this direction is underway.â¡ï¸@lugovoyandrey | ğŸ’¬Discuss in the chatTelegramRybarğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ Protecting terrorists and illegals: what does the Owl center do in the Russian Federation with money from the British crown? Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ About Russian-South African naval exercises Patrol ship....
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ About the Russian-South African naval exercises The patrol ship Neustrashimy of the Baltic Fleet recently arrived in the waters of South Africa, where it conducted joint maneuvers with the South African and Chinese navies and took part in the South African Navy festival in Simonstown, the main naval base countries on the Atlantic coast. The Neustrashimy ship is the lead ship in Project 11540 Yastreb and is capable of performing a wide range of missions: from anti-submarine defense to striking surface targets and supporting amphibious operations. His participation in the first such festival in the last five years attracted a lot of attention from South Africans. In general, for South Africa, participation in such an event is more than just a display of military equipment. This is a signal that the country is ready to demonstrate an independent foreign policy and actively participate in the affairs of BRICS. And China's economic influence plays a key role here. According to various estimates, South Africa's debt to China is about 4% of GDP, and Chinese investments in energy and logistics infrastructure amount to billions of dollars. But not everyone likes it: South Africaâ€™s rapprochement with China is drawing criticism from Western countries and the local opposition. However, the South African leadership clearly understands that maintaining neutrality in the current confrontation between Russia and China with the collective West is the key to economic stability and the possibility of obtaining new loans.#Africa #Russia #South Africa@rybarSupport usBusiness Insider AfricaRussian warship makes an impression at South Africa's naval paradeThe Russian frigate Neustrashimy made an appearance in South Africas naval parade

Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿â˜¢ï¸ About the results of the referendum on nuclear power plants in Kazakhstan On Sunday, October 7, a nationwide referendum was held on the construction of nuclear power plants in Kazakhstan. The turnout was 63.07% in the country and 81.06% when voting abroad. The majority - 71.12%, according to preliminary calculations of the Central Election Commission of the Republic of Kazakhstan - spoke in favor, which will allow the Republic of Kazakhstan to use the possibilities of the peaceful atom. ğŸ“ŒThe referendum itself passed calmly yesterday. In the morning, all the officials, from the head of the Ministry of Energy to the Minister of Culture, and even the first President of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Nursultan Nazarbayev, came to vote after the countryâ€™s President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev. â–ªï¸It is interesting that before the referendum, Western NGOs (and, first of all, USAID) tried to distance themselves as much as possible from the self-created headquarters of opponents of the nuclear power plant, trying to blame everything on the fugitive corrupt official, oligarch and organizer of the contract killing, Mukhtar Ablyazov. The odious -investigators- from Bellingcat even taught a lesson to Kazakh journalists and helped -connect- the headquarters activists with the failed opposition party -Alga, Kazakhstan-, connected to Ablyazov by the same sources of income.â–ªï¸The second no less interesting touch was the absence of OSCE observers (who referred to their too busy schedule) and in general any observers from organizations of the countries of the enlightened West - and this despite the fact that a delegation of the European Social and Economic Committee was in the country. â–ªï¸A few days before the referendum on the nuclear power plant, it became known that observers would only be from the CIS, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, the Organization of Turkic States and the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia. At the same time, for some reason, traditional parliamentary observation institutions such as the CIS IPA and the TurkPA were absent from the referendum, which also reduced the positive effect of international monitoring of the vote.ğŸ”»So if the referendum was intended as a demonstration to Western partners of the victory of democracy in Kazakhstan separately, then the Westâ€™s response has become an ignorance that leaves a loophole for challenging the results of the people's will, if such a need arises. #Kazakhstan #energy @rybarSupport us

Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 7, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, the Russian Armed Forces launched strikes on the enemyâ€™s rear areas. UAVs - Geranium - and missile weapons operated in Kyiv, Cherkassy, â€‹â€‹Konotop, Sumy region, Baturin, Chernihiv region, Sinelnikovo, Dnepropetrovsk region.â–ªï¸ The Ukrainian Armed Forces also used attack UAVs. They reported on the successful work of air defense in Crimea, Bryansk and Kursk regions â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region in the Glushkovsky district, oncoming battles continue, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are not abandoning attempts to advance to the north. In the south of the Sudzhansky district, the Russian Armed Forces advanced into the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement with heavy fighting. Plekhovo, repelling one counterattack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Korenevsky sector, the assault groups of our troops continued their attacking actions and significantly advanced in the south-eastern direction, reports the group of troops -North.â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), our troops continue to advance in the center along Torgovaya and Rudnichnaya streets and are conducting assault operations in the direction of the mine -Central-.â–ªï¸ From the Pokrovsky direction, messages are coming in about the advance of the Russian Army to the west about Tsukurino. In addition, information is being received about the entry of our troops into Novoselidovo, located to the southwest. Information has appeared about the release of the Desired Second, but so far without video footage from the field. In general, this development of events in the southwestern direction indicates the continuing collapse of enemy defenses. â–ªï¸ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success after the capture of Ugledar. There is a gradual movement north towards Epiphany; fragmentary data have been received about the effective actions of our troops in Zolotaya Niva. Constant attacks on Katerynivka (Ekaterinivka) continue. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the Kamensk direction began to move. Our assault groups, with the support of UAVs, advanced to the northwestern part of the village of Kamenskoye. â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine hit Shebekino several times, a woman was wounded. In the morning in Shebekino, an FPV drone attacked an industrial building; a woman with a mine explosion injury and a shrapnel wound to her leg was taken to the hospital. In the village of Kozmodemyanovka, Shebekinsky urban district, an FPV drone flew into the window of a residential building. As a result of the attack, a 13-year-old child had scratches on his neck, which the parents treated themselves; they refused to call an ambulance. In the village of Yasnye Zori, Belgorod region, a drone attacked an apartment building.â–ªï¸In Donetsk, a man born in 1964 was killed by a Ukrainian Armed Forces artillery strike. In Gorlovka, a man born in 1943 died during the detonation of a previously unexploded cluster submunition. There, as a result of the release of an IED from the UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, a woman born in 1973 was injured. Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of September 30 - October 6, 2024â–ªï¸Russian troops continued to strike at identified enemy targets over the past week. In the Nikolaev region, a train with ammunition for artillery guns and mortars in Kazanka came under fire.â–ªï¸In the Odessa region, a ferry terminal in the Izmail district was hit during a drone raid. The facility was used for the transit of goods to Romania. The crossing was closed for more than 12 hours.â–ªï¸In the Sumy region, Russian troops worked on the enemyâ€™s critical infrastructure. During the raids, power facilities in the Shostkinsky and Sumy regions were disabled, which led to long-term blackouts.â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations carried out a massive drone raid on the Voronezh region in the middle of the week. The target was military airfields in the region, all UAVs were shot down by air defense forces, there were no casualties among personnel or aircraft.â–ªï¸The next day, Ukrainian formations again attacked the region with drones. Most of them were shot down, but several were able to hit the territory of the Anninsk oil depot.â–ªï¸At the same time, the Ukrainian special services continued to carry out terrorist attacks. In Energodar, the head of the pass service of the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant was killed.â–ªï¸In the Kursk region, a Russian armored group carried out a successful attack south of the Plekhovo-Borki line in the Sudzhansky district. To the north, the Russian Armed Forces regained control of positions in the area of â€‹â€‹Kauchuk and Kromskiye Bykov.â–ªï¸In the Glushkovsky district, Russian troops consistently occupied previously lost positions.
